<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:0pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:3pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000; border-bottom:1.5pt solid #000000"><BR></P>
<HR style="padding-top:7.2pt; padding-bottom:7.2pt; color:#000000" noshade size=1.333>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Item 8.01. Other Events</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">On or about December 15, 2004, Franklin Capital Corporation transferred a portion of prime, non-prime and sub-prime motor vehicle retail installment sale contracts (the &#147;Initial Receivables&#148;) to Franklin Receivables LLC and Franklin Receivables LLC transferred the Initial Receivables to Franklin Auto Trust 2004-2 (the &#147;Trust&#148;). &nbsp;The Trust granted a security interest in the Initial Receivables to The Bank of New York and issued: (i) Class A-1 Asset Backed Notes in the aggregate original principal amount of $45,000,000; (ii) Class A-2 Asset Backed Notes in the aggregate original principal amount of $58,000,000; (iii) Class A-3 Asset Backed Notes in the aggregate original principal amount of $64,000,000, and (iv) Class A-4 Asset Backed Notes in the aggregate original principal amount of $66,000,000 (collectively, the &#147;Notes&#148;). &nbsp;This
 Current Report on Form 8-K is being filed to file a copy of the Amended and Restated Trust Agreement, Indenture, Sale and Servicing Agreement, Financial Guarantee Insurance Policy, Purchase Agreement, Underwriting Agreement and Letter Agreement (as listed below) and other operative agreements executed in connection with the issuance of the Notes.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Item 9.01.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Financial Statements and Exhibits</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><U>Information and Exhibits</U>.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">(a)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Not applicable.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">(b)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Not applicable.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">(c)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Exhibits:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Item 601(a) of Regulation S-K</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><U>Exhibit No.</U></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><U>Description</U></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">4.1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Amended &amp; Restated Trust Agreement, between Franklin Receivables LLC and Deutsche Bank Trust Company Delaware, dated as of &nbsp;December 1, 2004.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">4.2</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Indenture, between the Trust and The Bank of New York, dated as of <BR>
December 1, 2004.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">4.3</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Sale and Servicing Agreement, among Franklin Receivables LLC, Franklin Capital Corporation, Franklin Resources Inc. and the Trust, dated as of &nbsp;<BR>
December 1, 2004.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">4.4</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">MBIA Insurance Corporation Financial Guarantee Insurance Policy.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">10.1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Purchase Agreement, between Franklin Receivables LLC and Franklin Capital Corporation, dated as of December 1, 2004.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">10.2</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Underwriting Agreement, among Franklin Receivables LLC, Franklin Capital Corporation and Citigroup Global Markets Inc., dated December 2, 2004.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">10.3</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:252pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:18pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Harold E. Miller, Jr.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:252pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:18pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">President and Chief Executive Officer</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Dated: &nbsp;December 28, 2004</P>
<HR style="padding-top:7.2pt; padding-bottom:7.2pt; color:#000000" noshade size=1.333>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center><U>INDEX TO EXHIBITS</U></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><U>Exhibit No.</U></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><U>Description</U></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">4.1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Amended &amp; Restated Trust Agreement, between Franklin Receivables LLC and Deutsche Bank Trust Company Delaware, dated as of &nbsp;December 1, 2004.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">4.2</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Indenture, between the Trust and The Bank of New York, dated as of <BR>
December 1, 2004.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">4.3</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Sale and Servicing Agreement, among Franklin Receivables LLC, Franklin Capital Corporation, Franklin Resources Inc. and the Trust, dated as of &nbsp;<BR>
December 1, 2004.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">4.4</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">MBIA Insurance Corporation Financial Guarantee Insurance Policy.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">10.1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Purchase Agreement, between Franklin Receivables LLC and Franklin Capital Corporation, dated as of December 1, 2004.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">10.2</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Underwriting Agreement, among Franklin Receivables LLC, Franklin Capital Corporation and Citigroup Global Markets Inc., dated December 2, 2004.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">10.3</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Letter Agreement, between Franklin Resources Inc. and Citigroup Global Markets Inc., dated December 2, 2004.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-72pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center><BR></P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:48pt; padding-left:0pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:3pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000; border-bottom:0.5pt solid #000000" align=center><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:48pt; padding-left:0pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:3pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000; border-bottom:0.5pt solid #000000" align=center><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:48pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>FRANKLIN AUTO TRUST 2004-2</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:48pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>AMENDED AND RESTATED TRUST AGREEMENT</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:48pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>between</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:48pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>Seller</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:48pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>and</P>

Owner Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:24pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>Dated as of December 1, 2004</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:0pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:3pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000; border-bottom:0.5pt solid #000000"><BR></P>
<HR style="padding-top:7.2pt; padding-bottom:7.2pt; color:#000000" noshade size=1.333>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center><U>TABLE OF CONTENTS</U></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:24pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=right><U>Page</U></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE I Definitions</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 1.1 &nbsp;Capitalized Terms</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 1.2 &nbsp;Other Definitional Provisions</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">3</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE II &nbsp;Organization</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.1 &nbsp;Name</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">4</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.2 &nbsp;Office</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">4</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.3 &nbsp;Purposes and Powers</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">4</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.4 &nbsp;Appointment of Owner Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">5</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.5 &nbsp;Initial Capital Contribution of Owner Trust Estate</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">5</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.6 &nbsp;Declaration of Trust</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">5</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.7 &nbsp;Liability of the Seller</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">6</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.8 &nbsp;Title to Trust Property</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">6</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.9 &nbsp;Situs of Trust</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">6</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.10 &nbsp;Representations and Warranties of the Seller</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">6</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.11 &nbsp;[Reserved]</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">7</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.12 &nbsp;Covenants of the Certificateholders</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">7</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.13 &nbsp;Federal Income Tax Matters</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">8</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE III &nbsp;Trust Certificates and Transfer of Interests</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.1 &nbsp;Initial Ownership</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">9</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.2 &nbsp;The Trust Certificates</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">9</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.3 &nbsp;Authentication of Trust Certificates</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">9</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.4 &nbsp;Registration of Transfer and Exchange of Trust Certificates</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">10</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.5 &nbsp;Mutilated, Destroyed, Lost or Stolen Trust Certificates</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">10</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.6 &nbsp;Persons Deemed Certificateholders</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">11</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.7 &nbsp;Access to List of Certificateholders&#146; Names and Addresses</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">11</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.8 &nbsp;Maintenance of Office or Agency</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">11</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.9 &nbsp;Appointment of Paying Agent</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">12</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.10 &nbsp;[Reserved]</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE IV Actions by Owner Trustee</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">14</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 7.8 &nbsp;Payments from Owner Trust Estate</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">25</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE VIII Compensation of Owner Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 8.1 &nbsp;Owner Trustee&#146;s Fees and Expenses</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">26</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 8.2 &nbsp;Indemnification</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">26</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 8.3 &nbsp;Payments to the Owner Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">26</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 8.4 &nbsp;Non-recourse Obligations</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">26</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE IX &nbsp;Dissolution and Termination of Trust</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 9.1 &nbsp;Termination of Trust Agreement</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">27</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 9.2 &nbsp;[Reserved]</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">28</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE X &nbsp;Successor Owner Trustees and Additional Owner Trustees</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 10.1 &nbsp;Eligibility Requirements for Owner Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">28</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 10.2 &nbsp;Resignation or Removal of Owner Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">28</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 10.3 &nbsp;Successor Owner Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">29</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 10.4 &nbsp;Merger or Consolidation of Owner Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">30</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 10.5 &nbsp;Appointment of Co-Trustee or Separate Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">30</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE XI Miscellaneous</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.1 &nbsp;Supplements and Amendments</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">31</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.2 &nbsp;No Legal Title to Owner Trust Estate in Certificateholders</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">32</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.3 &nbsp;Limitations on Rights of Others</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">33</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.4 &nbsp;Notices</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">33</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.5 &nbsp;Severability</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">33</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.6 &nbsp;Separate Counterparts</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">33</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.7 &nbsp;Successors and Assigns</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">33</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.8 &nbsp;[Reserved]</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">34</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.9 &nbsp;No Petition</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">34</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.10 &nbsp;No Recourse</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">34</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.11 &nbsp;Headings</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">34</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.12 &nbsp;GOVERNING LAW</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">34</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.13 &nbsp;[Reserved]</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">34</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.14 &nbsp;Servicer</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">34</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-10pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:10pt; font-size:10pt; color:#000000">SECTION 11.15 &nbsp;Third Party Beneficiary</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:72pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">34</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">EXHIBITS</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">EXHIBIT A </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">FORM OF TRUST CERTIFICATE</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">EXHIBIT B</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">FORM OF CERTIFICATE OF TRUST</P>
<HR style="padding-top:7.2pt; padding-bottom:7.2pt; color:#000000" noshade size=1.333>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>AMENDED AND RESTATED TRUST AGREEMENT dated as of December 1, 2004 between FRANKLIN RECEIVABLES LLC, as seller, and DEUTSCHE BANK TRUST COMPANY DELAWARE, as Owner Trustee, which amends and restates the TRUST AGREEMENT dated as of December 1, 2004 between FRANKLIN RECEIVABLES LLC, as seller, and DEUTSCHE BANK TRUST COMPANY DELAWARE, as Owner Trustee.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE I</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center><U>Definitions</U></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 1.1 &nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Capitalized Terms</U>. &nbsp;For all purposes of this Agreement, the following terms shall have the meanings set forth below:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Agreement&#148; shall mean this Amended and Restated Trust Agreement, as the same may be amended and supplemented from time to time.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Basic Documents&#148; shall mean this Agreement, the Certificate of Trust, the Sale and Servicing Agreement, the Indenture, the Purchase Agreement, the Spread Account Agreement, the Servicer Deposit Support Agreement, the Insurance Agreement, the Indemnification Agreement, the Note Depository Agreement and the other documents and certificates delivered in connection therewith.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Benefit Plan&#148; shall have the meaning assigned to such term in Section 3.17.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Certificate&#148; means a certificate evidencing the beneficial interest of a Certificateholder in the Trust, substantially in the form of Exhibit A attached hereto.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Certificate Distribution Account&#148; shall have the meaning assigned to such term in Section 5.1.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Certificate of Trust&#148; shall mean the Certificate of Trust in the form of Exhibit B to be filed for the Trust pursuant to Section 3810(a) of the Statutory Trust Statute.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Certificate Paying Agent&#148; shall mean any paying agent or co-paying agent appointed pursuant to Section 3.9.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Certificateholder&#148; or &#147;Holder&#148; shall mean the Person in whose name a Certificate is registered on the Certificate Register.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Certificate Register&#148; and &#147;Certificate Registrar&#148; shall mean the register mentioned and the registrar appointed pursuant to Section 3.4.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Code&#148; shall mean the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended from time to time, and Treasury Regulations promulgated thereunder.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Corporate Trust Office&#148; shall mean, with respect to the Owner Trustee, the principal corporate trust office of the Owner Trustee located at E.A. Delle Donne Corporate Center Montgomery Building, 1011 Centre Road, Suite 200, Wilmington, Delaware 19805-1266, with a copy of all notices and other documents to be also furnished to Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, 60 Wall Street, 26th Floor, New York, New York 10005, Attention: Corporate Trust and Agency Services, Structured Finance Services, or at such other address as the Owner Trustee may designate by notice to the Certificateholders and the Seller, or the principal corporate trust office of any successor Owner Trustee (the address of which the successor owner trustee will notify the Certificateholders and the Seller).</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Delaware Trustee&#148; shall have the meaning assigned to such term in Section 10.1.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;ERISA&#148; shall have the meaning assigned to such term in Section 3.17.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Expenses&#148; shall have the meaning assigned to such term in Section 8.2.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Holder&#148; or &#147;Certificateholder&#148; shall mean the Person in whose name a Trust Certificate is registered on the Certificate Register.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Indemnified Parties&#148; shall have the meaning assigned to such term in Section 8.2.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Indenture&#148; shall mean the Indenture between the Trust, as issuer, and The Bank of New York, as trustee and indenture collateral agent, dated as of December 1, 2004, as the same may be amended and supplemented from time to time.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Instructing Party&#148; shall have the meaning assigned to such term in Section 6.3.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Owner Trust Estate&#148; shall mean all right, title and interest of the Trust in and to the property and rights assigned to the Trust pursuant to Article II of the Sale and Servicing Agreement, all funds on deposit from time to time in the Trust Accounts and all other property of the Trust from time to time, including any rights of the Owner Trustee and the Trust pursuant to the Sale and Servicing Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Owner Trustee&#148; shall mean Deutsche Bank Trust Company Delaware, a Delaware banking corporation not in its individual capacity but solely as owner trustee under this Agreement, and any successor Owner Trustee hereunder.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Paying Agent&#148; shall mean any paying agent or co-paying agent appointed pursuant to Section 3.9. </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Percentage Interest&#148; shall mean with respect to any Trust Certificate, the percentage interest of ownership in the Trust represented thereby as set forth on the face thereof.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Record Date&#148; shall mean, with respect to any Distribution Date, the close of business on the last day of the calendar month preceding such Distribution Date.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Responsible Officer&#148; shall mean, when used with respect to the Owner Trustee, any officer assigned to the Corporate Trust Office of the Owner Trustee, including any Vice President, any Assistant Vice President, any Assistant Treasurer, any Managing Director, any trust officer or any other officer of the Owner Trustee customarily performing functions similar to those performed by any of the above designated officers or any agent acting under a power of attorney from the Owner Trustee, having responsibility for the administration of this Trust Agreement, as the case may be, and also, with respect to a particular matter relating to the Trust, any other officer of the Owner Trustee to whom such matter is referred because of such officer&#146;s knowledge of and familiarity with such matter. &nbsp;Any notice given to the address and in the manner sp
ecified in Section 11.4 hereof shall be deemed to be given to a Responsible Officer.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Sale and Servicing Agreement&#148; shall mean the Sale and Servicing Agreement among the Trust, Franklin Receivables LLC, as seller, Franklin Resources, Inc., as representative, and Franklin Capital Corporation, as servicer, dated as of December 1, 2004, as the same may be amended and supplemented from time to time.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Secretary of State&#148; shall mean the Secretary of State of the State of Delaware.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Security Insurer&#148; shall mean MBIA Insurance Corporation, or its successor in interest.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Securities Act&#148; shall mean the Securities Act of 1933, as amended.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Seller&#148; shall mean Franklin Receivables LLC as the seller of the Receivables pursuant to the Sale and Servicing Agreement and each successor to Franklin Receivables LLC (in the same capacity), to the extent permitted hereunder.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Seller Indemnification Cap&#148; shall have the meaning assigned to such term in Section 8.2.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Statutory Trust Statute&#148; shall mean Chapter 38 of Title 12 of the Delaware Code, 12 Del. Code &#167;&nbsp;3801 <U>et</U> <U>seq.</U>, as the same may be amended from time to time.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Treasury Regulations&#148; shall mean regulations, including proposed or temporary regulations, promulgated under the Code. &nbsp;References herein to specific provisions of proposed or temporary regulations shall include analogous provisions of final Treasury Regulations or other successor Treasury Regulations.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Trust&#148; shall mean the trust established by this Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Trust Certificate&#148; shall mean a Certificate.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 1.2 &nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Other Definitional Provisions</U>.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(a)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:144pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined have the meanings assigned to them in the Sale and Servicing Agreement or, if not defined therein, in the Indenture.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(b)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:144pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>All terms defined in this Agreement shall have the defined meanings when used in any certificate or other document made or delivered pursuant hereto unless otherwise defined therein.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(c)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:144pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>As used in this Agreement and in any certificate or other document made or delivered pursuant hereto or thereto, accounting terms not defined in this Agreement or in any such certificate or other document, and accounting terms partly defined in this Agreement or in any such certificate or other document to the extent not defined, shall have the respective meanings given to them under generally accepted accounting principles as in effect on the date of this Agreement or any such certificate or other document, as applicable. &nbsp;To the extent that the definitions of accounting terms in this Agreement or in any such certificate or other document are inconsistent with the meanings of such terms under generally accepted accounting principles, the definitions contained in this Agreement or in any such certificate or other document shall control.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(d)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:144pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>The words &#147;hereof,&#148; &#147;herein,&#148; &#147;hereunder&#148; and words of similar import when used in this Agreement shall refer to this Agreement as a whole and not to any particular provision of this Agreement; Section and Exhibit references contained in this Agreement are references to Sections and Exhibits in or to this Agreement unless otherwise specified; and the term &#147;including&#148; shall mean &#147;including without limitation.&#148;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(e)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:144pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>The definitions contained in this Agreement are applicable to the singular as well as the plural forms of such terms and to the masculine as well as to the feminine and neuter genders of such terms.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE II</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center><U>Organization</U></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 2.1 &nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Name</U>. &nbsp;The Trust continued hereby shall be known as &#147;Franklin Auto Trust 2004-2&#148; in which name the Owner Trustee may engage in the transactions contemplated hereby, make and execute contracts and other instruments on behalf of the Trust and sue and be sued.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 2.2 &nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Office</U>. &nbsp;The office of the Trust shall be in care of the Owner Trustee at the Corporate Trust Office, or at the office of the Delaware Trustee, if one exists, or at such other address as the Owner Trustee may designate by written notice to the Certificateholders, the Security Insurer and the Seller.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 2.3 &nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Purposes and Powers</U>. &nbsp;(a) &nbsp;The purpose of the Trust is, and the Trust shall have the power and authority, to engage in the following activities:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(i)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>to issue the Notes pursuant to the Indenture and the Trust Certificates pursuant to this Agreement, and to sell the Notes and the Certificates; </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(ii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>with the proceeds of the sale of the Notes, to fund the Pre-Funding Account and the Capitalized Interest Account, to pay the organizational, start-up and transactional expenses of the Trust and to pay the balance to the Seller pursuant to the Sale and Servicing Agreement;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(iii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>to acquire, receive and accept from time to time the Owner Trust Estate, to assign, grant, transfer, pledge, mortgage and convey the Owner Trust Estate (other than the Certificate Distribution Account) to the Indenture Collateral Agent pursuant to the Indenture for the benefit of the Security Insurer and the Trustee on behalf of the Noteholders and to hold, manage and distribute to the Certificateholders pursuant to the terms of the Sale and Servicing Agreement any portion of the Owner Trust Estate released from the Lien of, and remitted to the Trust pursuant to, the Indenture;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(iv)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>to enter into and perform its obligations under the Basic Documents to which it is a party;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(v)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>to engage in those activities, including entering into agreements, that are necessary, suitable or convenient to accomplish the foregoing or are incidental thereto or connected therewith; and</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(vi)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>subject to compliance with the Basic Documents to which the Trust is a party, to engage in such other activities as may be required in connection with conservation of the Owner Trust Estate and the making of distributions to the Certificateholders and the Noteholders.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">The Trust is hereby authorized to engage in the foregoing activities. &nbsp;The Trust shall not engage in any activity other than in connection with the foregoing or other than as required or authorized by the terms of this Agreement or the Basic Documents.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 2.4 &nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Appointment of Owner Trustee</U>. &nbsp;The Seller hereby appoints the Owner Trustee as trustee of the Trust effective as of the date hereof, to have all the rights, powers and duties set forth herein.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 2.5 &nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Initial Capital Contribution of Owner Trust Estate</U>. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Owner Trustee hereby acknowledges receipt in trust from the Seller, as of the date hereof, of $200, which shall constitute the initial Owner Trust Estate and shall be deposited in the Certificate Distribution Account. &nbsp;The Seller shall pay organizational expenses of the Trust as they may arise or shall, upon the request of the Owner Trustee, promptly reimburse the Owner Trustee for any such expenses paid by the Owner Trustee.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 2.6 &nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Declaration of Trust</U>. &nbsp;The Owner Trustee hereby declares that it will hold the Owner Trust Estate in trust upon and subject to the conditions set forth herein for the use and benefit of the Certificateholders, subject to the obligations of the Trust under the Basic Documents to which the Trust is a party. &nbsp;It is the intention of the parties hereto that the Trust constitute a statutory trust under the Statutory Trust Statute and that this Agreement constitute the governing instrument of such statutory trust. &nbsp;It is the intention of the parties hereto that, solely for federal income tax purposes and, to the extent permitted by law, for purposes of applicable state income or franchise tax, the Trust shall be disregarded as an entity apart from its owner, the Seller, in the event that the Seller is the sole Certi
ficateholder for federal income tax purposes, or treated as a partnership if there is more than one Certificateholder for federal income tax purposes. &nbsp;The parties agree that, unless otherwise required by appropriate tax authorities, the Trust will file or cause to be filed annual or other necessary returns, reports and other forms consistent with the characterization of the Trust as a division of the Seller, or as a partnership, as the case may be, for such tax purposes. &nbsp;Effective as of the date hereof, the Owner Trustee shall have all rights, powers and duties set forth herein and to the extent not inconsistent herewith, in the Statutory Trust Statute with respect to accomplishing the purposes of the Trust. &nbsp;The Owner Trustee shall file the Certificate of Trust with the Secretary of State.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 2.7 &nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Liability of the Seller</U>. &nbsp;(a) &nbsp;The Seller shall pay organizational expenses of the Trust as they may arise or shall, upon the request of the Owner Trustee, promptly reimburse the Owner Trustee for any such expenses paid by the Owner Trustee. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(b)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:144pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>No Holder, other than to the extent set forth in clause (a), shall have any personal liability for any liability or obligation of the Trust.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 2.8 &nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Title to Trust Property</U>. &nbsp;(a) &nbsp;Legal title to all the Owner Trust Estate shall be vested at all times in the Trust as a separate legal entity except where applicable law in any jurisdiction requires title to any part of the Owner Trust Estate to be vested in a trustee or trustees, in which case title shall be deemed to be vested in the Owner Trustee, a co-trustee and/or a separate trustee, as the case may be.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(b)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:144pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>The Certificateholders shall not have legal title to any part of the Owner Trust Estate. &nbsp;The Certificateholders shall be entitled to receive distributions with respect to their undivided Percentage Interest therein only in accordance with Articles V and IX. &nbsp;No transfer, by operation of law or otherwise, of any right, title or interest by any Certificateholder of its ownership interest in the Owner Trust Estate shall operate to terminate this Agreement or the trusts hereunder or entitle any transferee to an accounting or to the transfer to it of legal title to any part of the Owner Trust Estate.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 2.9 &nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Situs of Trust</U>. &nbsp;The Trust will be located in the State of Delaware. &nbsp;All bank accounts maintained by the Owner Trustee on behalf of the Trust shall be located in the State of Delaware or the State of New York. &nbsp;Payments will be received by the Trust only in Delaware or New York, and payments will be made by the Trust only from Delaware or New York. &nbsp;The Trust shall not have any employees in any state other than Delaware; <U>provided</U>, <U>however</U>, that nothing herein shall restrict or prohibit the Owner Trustee, in its individual capacity, the Servicer or any agent of the Trust from having employees within or without the State of Delaware. &nbsp;The only office of the Trust will be at the Corporate Trust Office in Delaware.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 2.10 &nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Representations and Warranties of the Seller</U>. &nbsp;The Seller hereby represents and warrants to the Owner Trustee that:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(a)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:144pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Organization and Good Standing</U>. &nbsp;The Seller is duly organized and validly existing as a Delaware limited liability company with power and authority to own its properties and to conduct its business as such properties are currently owned and such business is presently conducted.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(b)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:144pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Due Qualification</U>. &nbsp;The Seller is duly qualified to do business as a limited liability company in good standing, and has obtained all necessary licenses and approvals, in all jurisdictions in which the ownership or lease of its property, the conduct of its business and the performance of its obligations under this Agreement and the Basic Documents requires such qualification.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(c)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:144pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Power and Authority</U>. &nbsp;The Seller has the power and authority to execute and deliver this Agreement and to carry out its terms; the Seller has full power and authority to sell and assign the property to be sold and assigned to and deposited with the Trust and the Seller has duly authorized such sale and assignment and deposit to the Trust by all necessary action; and the execution, delivery and performance of this Agreement has been duly authorized by the Seller by all necessary action.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(d)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:144pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>No Violation</U>. &nbsp;The consummation of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement and the fulfillment of the terms hereof do not conflict with, result in any breach of any of the terms and provisions of, or constitute (with or without notice or lapse of time) a default under, the certificate of formation or limited liability company agreement of the Seller, or any material indenture, agreement or other instrument to which the Seller is a party or by which it is bound; nor result in the creation or imposition of any Lien upon any of its properties pursuant to the terms of any such indenture, agreement or other instrument (other than pursuant to the Basic Documents); nor violate any law or, to the best of the Seller&#146;s knowledge, any order, rule or regulation applicable to the Seller of any court or of any Federal or state regulatory body
, administrative agency or other governmental instrumentality having jurisdiction over the Seller or its properties.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(e)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:144pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>No Consent Required</U>. &nbsp;No consent, license, approval or authorization or registration or declaration with, any Person or with any governmental authority, bureau or agency is required in connection with the execution, delivery or performance of this Agreement and the Basic Documents, except for such as have been obtained, effected or made. </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(f)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:144pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>No Proceedings</U>. &nbsp;There are no proceedings or investigations pending or, to its knowledge threatened against it before any court, regulatory body, administrative agency or other tribunal or governmental instrumentality having jurisdiction over it or its properties (A) asserting the invalidity of this Agreement or any of the Basic Documents, (B) seeking to prevent the issuance of the Certificates or the Notes or the consummation of any of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement or any of the Basic Documents, (C) seeking any determination or ruling that might materially and adversely affect its performance of its obligations under, or the validity or enforceability of, this Agreement or any of the Basic Documents, or (D) seeking to adversely affect the federal income tax or other federal, state or local tax attributes of the Certificate
s.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 2.11 &nbsp;&nbsp;[<U>Reserved</U>]</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 2.12 &nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Covenants of the Certificateholders</U>. &nbsp;Each Certificateholder by becoming a holder of a Certificate agrees: </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(a)</P>
