<TR><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=207.2>&nbsp;</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=440 colspan=2>&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=207.2>&nbsp;</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=440 colspan=2><P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-right:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36.6pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-36.6pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">By:</P>
<P style="margin:0pt; padding-left:36.6pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">_____________________________________</P>
<P style="margin:0pt; padding-left:72.6pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-36.6pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Authorized Signatory</P>
</TD></TR>
</TABLE>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<HR style="padding-top:7.2pt; padding-bottom:7.2pt; color:#000000" noshade size=1.333>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>(Reverse of Trust Certificate)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>The Trust Certificates do not represent an obligation of, or an interest in, the Seller, the Servicer, the Owner Trustee or any of their respective Affiliates and no recourse may be had against such parties or their assets, except as may be expressly set forth or contemplated herein or in the Trust Agreement, the Indenture or the Basic Documents. &nbsp;In addition, this Trust Certificate is not guaranteed by any governmental agency or instrumentality and is limited in right of payment to certain collections with respect to the Receivables (and certain other amounts), all as more specifically set forth herein and in the Sale and Servicing Agreement. &nbsp;The Trust Certificates are limited in right of payment to certain collections and recoveries respecting the Receivables, all as more specifically set forth in the Sale and Servicing Agreement. &nbsp;A co
py of each of the Sale and Servicing Agreement and the Trust Agreement may be examined during normal business hours at the principal office of the Seller, and at such other places, if any, designated by the Seller, by any Certificateholder upon written request.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>The Trust Agreement permits, with certain exceptions therein provided, the amendment thereof and the modification of the rights and obligations of the Seller and the rights of the Certificateholders under the Trust Agreement at any time by the Seller and the Owner Trustee with the prior written consent of the Security Insurer (so long as an Insurer Default shall not have occurred and be continuing) and with the consent of the holders of the Notes and the Trust Certificates evidencing not less than a majority of the outstanding principal balance of the Notes and a majority in Percentage Interest of the Certificates. &nbsp;Any such consent by the holder of this Trust Certificate shall be conclusive and binding on such holder and on all future holders of this Trust Certificate and of any Trust Certificate issued upon the transfer hereof or in exchange hereo
f or in lieu hereof whether or not notation of such consent is made upon this Trust Certificate. &nbsp;The Trust Agreement also permits the amendment thereof, in certain limited circumstances, without the consent of the holders of any of the Trust Certificates.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>As provided in the Trust Agreement and subject to certain limitations therein set forth, the transfer of this Trust Certificate is registerable in the Certificate Register upon surrender of this Trust Certificate for registration of transfer at the offices or agencies of the Certificate Registrar maintained by the Owner Trustee in the Borough of Manhattan, the City of New York, accompanied by a written instrument of transfer in form satisfactory to the Owner Trustee and the Certificate Registrar duly executed by the holder hereof or such holder&#146;s attorney duly authorized in writing, and thereupon one or more new Trust Certificates in authorized denominations evidencing the same aggregate interest in the Trust will be issued to the designated transferee. &nbsp;The initial Certificate Registrar appointed under the Trust Agreement is Deutsche Bank Trus
t Company Americas.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>As provided in the Trust Agreement and subject to certain limitations therein set forth, Trust Certificates are exchangeable for new Trust Certificates in authorized denominations evidencing the same aggregate denomination, as requested by the holder surrendering the same. &nbsp;&nbsp;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>No service charge will be made for any such registration of transfer or exchange, but the Owner Trustee or the Certificate Registrar may require payment of a sum sufficient to cover any tax or governmental charge payable in connection therewith.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>The Owner Trustee, the Certificate Registrar and any agent of the Owner Trustee or the Certificate Registrar may treat the person in whose name this Trust Certificate is registered as the owner hereof for all purposes, and none of the Owner Trustee, the Certificate Registrar or any such agent shall be affected by any notice to the contrary.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>The obligations and responsibilities created by the Trust Agreement and the Trust created thereby shall terminate upon the payment to Certificateholders of all amounts required to be paid to them pursuant to the Trust Agreement and the Sale and Servicing Agreement and the disposition of all property held as part of the Owner Trust Estate. &nbsp;The Servicer may at its option purchase the corpus of the Trust at a price specified in the Sale and Servicing Agreement, and such purchase of the Receivables and other property of the Trust will effect early retirement of the Trust Certificates; however, such right of purchase is exercisable, subject to certain restrictions, only as of the last day of any Monthly Period as of which the Pool Balance is 10% or less of the Original Pool Balance. </P>
<HR style="padding-top:7.2pt; padding-bottom:7.2pt; color:#000000" noshade size=1.333>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>ASSIGNMENT</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>PLEASE INSERT SOCIAL SECURITY OR OTHER</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>IDENTIFYING NUMBER OF ASSIGNEE</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>FOR VALUE RECEIVED the undersigned hereby sells, assigns and transfers unto ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>(Please print or type name and address, including postal zip code, of assignee)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">the within Trust Certificate, and all rights thereunder, hereby irrevocably constitutes and appoints _______________________________________________ attorney to transfer said Trust Certificate on the books of the Certificate Registrar, with full power of substitution in the premises.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Dated:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:216pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;*</U></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:216pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Signature Guaranteed:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">*</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">NOTICE: &nbsp;The signature to this assignment must correspond with the name of the registered owner as it appears on the face of the within Trust Certificate in every particular, without alteration, enlargement or any change whatever. &nbsp;Such signature must be guaranteed by an &#147;eligible guarantor institution&#148; meeting the requirements of the Certificate Registrar, which requirements include membership or participation in STAMP or such other &#147;signature guarantee program&#148; as may be determined by the Certificate Registrar in addition to, or in substitution for, STAMP, all in accordance with the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.</P>
<HR style="padding-top:7.2pt; padding-bottom:7.2pt; color:#000000" noshade size=1.333>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>EXHIBIT B</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>FORM OF</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>CERTIFICATE OF TRUST OF</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center><U>FRANKLIN AUTO TRUST 2004-2</U></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>THIS Certificate of Trust of Franklin Auto Trust 2004-2 (the &#147;Trust&#148;), is being duly executed and filed on behalf of the Trust by the undersigned, as trustee, to form a statutory trust under the Delaware Statutory Trust Act (12 Del. Code, &#167; 3801 et seq.) (the &#147;Act&#148;).</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>1.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Name</U>. &nbsp;The name of the statutory trust formed by this Certificate of Trust is FRANKLIN AUTO TRUST 2004-2.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>2.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Delaware Trustee</U>. &nbsp;The name and business address of the trustee of the Trust in the State of Delaware is Deutsche Bank Trust Company Delaware, 1011 Centre Road, Wilmington, Delaware 19805.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>3.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Effective Date</U>. &nbsp;This Certificate of Trust shall be effective upon filing.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned, has duly executed this Certificate of Trust in accordance with Section 3811(a)(1) of the Act.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:216pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">DEUTSCHE BANK TRUST COMPANY DELAWARE,</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:216pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">not in its individual capacity but</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:216pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">solely as trustee of the Trust</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:216pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">By: _________________________________</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:234pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Name: &nbsp;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:234pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Title: &nbsp;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>CROSS REFERENCE TABLE</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<TABLE style="margin-left:0pt"><TR><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt; border:0.5pt solid #000000" align=left valign=top width=503.2 colspan=3><P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:11pt; font-size:11pt; color:#000000">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;TIA</P>
<P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:11pt; font-size:11pt; color:#000000">Section</P>
</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt; border:0.5pt solid #000000" align=left valign=top width=135.2><P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:11pt; font-size:11pt; color:#000000">Indenture</P>

<TR><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=47.2>&nbsp;</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=40><P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:11pt; font-size:11pt; color:#000000">(c)</P>
</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=416><P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-right:0pt; margin-bottom:-11pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:11pt; font-size:11pt; color:#000000">(1)</P>
<P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:294.6pt; font-size:11pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>

</TD></TR>
<TR><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=47.2>&nbsp;</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=40><P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:11pt; font-size:11pt; color:#000000">(c)</P>
</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=416><P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:294.6pt; font-size:11pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=135.2><P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:11pt; font-size:11pt; color:#000000">11.7</P>
</TD></TR>
</TABLE>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">______________________</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Note: &nbsp;This Cross Reference Table shall not, for any purpose, be deemed to be part of this Indenture.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">2</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">N.A. means Not Applicable.</P>
<HR style="padding-top:7.2pt; padding-bottom:7.2pt; color:#000000" noshade size=1.333>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>TABLE OF CONTENTS</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=right>Page</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE I<BR>
Definitions and Incorporation by Reference</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 1.1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Definitions</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:372pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">3</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 1.2</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Incorporation by Reference of Trust Indenture Act</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">11</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 1.3</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Rules of Construction</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">12</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE II<BR>
The Notes</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Form</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">12</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.2</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Execution, Authentication and Delivery</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">13</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.3</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Temporary Notes</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">13</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.4</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Registration; Registration of Transfer and Exchange</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">14</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.5</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Mutilated, Destroyed, Lost or Stolen Notes</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">15</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.6</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Persons Deemed Owner</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">16</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.7</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Payment of Principal and Interest; Defaulted Interest</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">16</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.8</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Cancellation</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">17</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.9</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Release of Collateral</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">17</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Book-Entry Notes</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">17</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.11</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">18</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 2.12</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Definitive Notes</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">18</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE III<BR>
Covenants</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Payment of Principal and Interest</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">19</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.2</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Maintenance of Office or Agency</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">19</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.3</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Money for Payments To Be Held in Trust</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">19</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.4</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Existence</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">21</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.5</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Protection of Trust Estate</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">21</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.6</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Opinions as to Trust Estate</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">22</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.7</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Performance of Obligations; Servicing of Receivables</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">22</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.8</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Negative Covenants</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">24</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.9</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Annual Statement as to Compliance</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">24</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.10</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Issuer May Consolidate, Etc. Only on Certain Terms</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">25</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.11</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Successor or Transferee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">27</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.12</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">No Other Business</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">27</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.13</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">No Borrowing</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">27</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.14</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Servicer&#146;s Obligations</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">27</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.15</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Guarantees, Loans, Advances and Other Liabilities</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">27</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.16</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Capital Expenditures</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">27</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.17</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Compliance with Laws</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">27</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.18</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Restricted Payments</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">28</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.19</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Notice of Events of Default</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">28</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 3.20</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Further Instruments and Acts</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">28</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">28</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">28</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">29</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE IV<BR>
Satisfaction and Discharge</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 4.1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Satisfaction and Discharge of Indenture</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">30</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">31</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Repayment of Moneys Held by Paying Agent</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">31</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE V<BR>
Remedies</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 5.1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Events of Default</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">31</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Unconditional Rights of Noteholders</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">39</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">40</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 5.10</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Rights and Remedies Cumulative</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">40</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 5.11</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Delay or Omission Not a Waiver</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">40</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 5.12</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Control by Noteholders</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">40</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 5.13</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Waiver of Past Defaults</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">41</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 5.14</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Undertaking for Costs</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">41</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 5.15</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Waiver of Stay or Extension Laws</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">41</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 5.16</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Action on Notes</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">42</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 5.17</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Performance and Enforcement of Certain Obligations</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">42</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 5.18</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Claims Under Note Policy</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">42</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 5.19</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Preference Claims</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">43</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE VI<BR>
The Trustee and the Indenture Collateral Agent</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Duties of Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">44</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.2</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Rights of Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">46</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.3</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Individual Rights of Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">47</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.4</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Trustee&#146;s Disclaimer</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">48</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.5</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Notice of Defaults</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">48</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.6</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Reports by Trustee to Holders</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">48</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.7</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Compensation and Indemnity</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">48</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.8</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Replacement of Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">49</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.9</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">50</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.10</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Appointment of Co-Trustee or Separate Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">51</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.11</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Eligibility; Disqualification</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">52</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.12</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Preferential Collection of Claims Against Issuer</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">52</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.13</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Appointment and Powers</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">52</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.14</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Performance of Duties</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">53</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.15</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Limitation on Liability</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">53</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.16</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Reliance Upon Documents</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">54</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.17</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Successor Indenture Collateral Agent</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">54</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.18</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Compensation</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">56</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.19</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Representations and Warranties of the Indenture Collateral Agent</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">56</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.20</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Waiver of Setoffs</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">56</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 6.21</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Control by the Controlling Party</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">56</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE VII<BR>
Noteholders&#146; Lists and Reports</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 7.1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Issuer To Furnish To Trustee Names and Addresses of Noteholders</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">57</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 7.2</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Preservation of Information; Communications to Noteholders</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">57</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 7.3</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Reports by Issuer</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">57</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 7.4</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Reports by Trustee</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">58</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE VIII<BR>
Accounts, Disbursements and Releases</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 8.1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Collection of Money</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">58</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 8.2</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Trust Accounts</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">58</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 8.3</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">General Provisions Regarding Accounts</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">59</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 8.4</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Release of Trust Estate</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">60</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 8.5</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Opinion of Counsel</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">60</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE IX<BR>
Supplemental Indentures</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 9.1</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Supplemental Indentures Without Consent of Noteholders</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">61</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 9.2</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Supplemental Indentures with Consent of Noteholders</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">62</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 9.3</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Execution of Supplemental Indentures</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">63</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-90pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">SECTION 9.4</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Effect of Supplemental Indenture</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">64</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Conformity With Trust Indenture Act</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:366pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">64</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Reference in Notes to Supplemental Indentures</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>ARTICLE X<BR>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:90pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:36pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Benefits of Indenture</P>
