<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Affiliate&#148; means, with respect to any specified Person, any other Person controlling or controlled by or under common control with such specified Person. &nbsp;For the purposes of this definition, &#147;control&#148; when used with respect to any Person means the power to direct the management and policies of such Person, directly or indirectly, whether through the ownership of voting securities, by contract or otherwise; and the terms &#147;controlling&#148; and &#147;controlled&#148; have meanings correlative to the foregoing. &nbsp;A Person shall not be deemed to be an Affiliate of any person solely because such other Person has the contractual right or obligation to manage such Person unless such other Person controls such Person through equity ownership or otherwise.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Agreement&#148; means this Sale and Servicing Agreement, as the same may be amended and supplemented from time to time.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Amount Financed&#148; means, with respect to a Receivable, the aggregate amount advanced under such Receivable toward the purchase price of the Financed Vehicle and any related costs, including amounts advanced in respect of accessories, insurance premiums, service, car club and warranty contracts, other items customarily financed as part of retail automobile installment sale contracts or promissory notes, and related costs.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Annual Percentage Rate&#148; or &#147;APR&#148; of a Receivable means the annual percentage rate of finance charges as stated in the related Contract or as recalculated based upon the terms of such Contract.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Available Funds&#148; means, with respect to any Determination Date, the sum (without double counting) of (i) the Collected Funds for such Determination Date, (ii) all Purchase Amounts deposited in the Collection Account during the related Monthly Period, and proceeds of any repurchase by a Dealer pursuant to Dealer Agreement, (iii) all Pre-Funding Earnings deposited in the Collection Account pursuant to Section 5.6(b), (iv) the Monthly Capitalized Interest Amount with respect to the related Distribution Date, (v) following the acceleration of the Notes pursuant to Section 5.2 of the Indenture, the amount of money or property collected pursuant to Section 5.4 of the Indenture since the preceding Determination Date by the Trustee or Controlling Party for distribution pursuant to Section 5.6 of the Indenture, and (vi) any Insolvency Proceeds received
 pursuant to Section 9.1(b) of this Agreement. </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Base Servicing Fee&#148; means, with respect to any Monthly Period, the fee payable to the Servicer for services rendered during such Monthly Period, which shall be equal to one-twelfth of the applicable Servicing Fee Rate multiplied by the Pool Balance applicable to Prime Receivables, Non-Prime Receivables and Sub-Prime Receivables, as applicable as of the first day of such Monthly Period; provided that the Base Servicing Fee shall not be greater than one twelfth of 1.25% per annum multiplied by the Pool Balance as of the first day of such Monthly Period.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Basic Documents&#148; means the Certificate of Trust, the Trust Agreement, this Agreement, the Indenture, the Spread Account Agreement, the Servicer Deposit Support Agreement, the Purchase Agreement, any Subsequent Purchase Agreement, any Subsequent Transfer Agreement, the Insurance Agreement, the Depository Agreement and other documents and certificates delivered in connection therewith.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Business Day&#148; means a day other than a Saturday, a Sunday or other day on which commercial banks located in the states of California or New York are authorized or obligated to be closed.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Capitalized Interest Account&#148; means the account designated as such, established and maintained pursuant to Section 5.1-A.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Capitalized Interest Account Initial Deposit&#148; means $144,439.91 deposited on the Closing Date.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Certificate&#148; means a certificate evidencing the beneficial interest of a Certificateholder in the Trust.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Certificate Distribution Account&#148; has the meaning assigned to such term in the Trust Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Certificateholder&#148; means each person in whose name a Certificate is registered.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Class&#148; means the Class A-1 Notes, the Class A-2 Notes, the Class A-3 Notes or the Class A-4 Notes, as the context requires.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Class A-1 Notes&#148; has the meaning assigned to such term in the Indenture.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Class A-2 Notes&#148; has the meaning assigned to such term in the Indenture.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Class A-3 Notes&#148; has the meaning assigned to such term in the Indenture.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Class A-4 Notes&#148; has the meaning assigned to such term in the Indenture.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Closing Date&#148; means December 15, 2004.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Code&#148; means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, and the Treasury Regulations promulgated thereunder.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Collected Funds&#148; means, with respect to any Determination Date, the amount of funds in or to be deposited in the Collection Account representing collections (excluding amounts constituting the Supplemental Servicing Fee) on the Receivables during the related Monthly Period, including all Net Liquidation Proceeds collected during the related Monthly Period (but excluding any Purchase Amounts).</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Collection Account&#148; means the account designated as such, established and maintained pursuant to Section 5.1 of this Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Computer Tape&#148; means the computer tapes or other electronic media furnished by or on behalf of the Seller to the Issuer and its assigns and the Security Insurer describing certain characteristics of the Initial Receivables as of the Initial Cutoff Date and of the Subsequent Receivables as of the applicable Subsequent Cutoff Date.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Contract&#148; means a motor vehicle retail installment sale contract.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Controlling Party&#148; means the Security Insurer, so long as no Insurer Default shall have occurred and be continuing, and the Trustee, for so long as an Insurer Default shall have occurred and be continuing.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Corporate Trust Office&#148; means (i) with respect to the Owner Trustee, the principal corporate trust office of the Owner Trustee, which at the time of execution of this Agreement is 1011 Centre Road, Suite 200, Wilmington, Delaware 10985, Attention: &nbsp;Corporate Trust Department and (ii) with respect to the Trustee and the Indenture Collateral Agent, the principal corporate office of the Trustee, which at the time of execution of this Agreement is One 101 Barclay Street, 8W, New York, New York 10286, Attention: &nbsp;Corporate Trust - ABS, Franklin Auto Trust 2004-2.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Cram Down Loss&#148; means, with respect to a Receivable, if a court of appropriate jurisdiction in an insolvency proceeding shall have issued an order reducing the amount owed on such Receivable or otherwise modifying or restructuring the scheduled payments to be made on such Receivable, an amount equal to the excess of (i) the principal balance of such Receivable immediately prior to such order over (ii) the principal balance of such Receivable as so reduced. &nbsp;A &#147;Cram Down Loss&#148; shall be deemed to have occurred on the date of issuance of such order.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Cutoff Date&#148; means, as applicable, (i) the Initial Cutoff Date, with respect to the Initial Receivables or (ii) the Subsequent Cutoff Date with respect to the related Subsequent Receivables.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Dealer&#148; means a dealer who sold a Financed Vehicle and who originated and assigned the respective Receivable to Franklin Capital under an existing agreement between such dealer and Franklin Capital. </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Dealer Agreement&#148; means any agreement between a Dealer and Franklin Capital relating to the acquisition of Receivables from a Dealer by Franklin Capital.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Deficiency Claim Date&#148; means, with respect to any Distribution Date, the fourth Business Day immediately preceding such Distribution Date. </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Deficiency Notice&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in Section 5.4(a) of this Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Delivery&#148; when used with respect to Trust Account Property means:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(a)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>with respect to bankers&#146; acceptances, commercial paper, negotiable certificates of deposit and other obligations that constitute instruments and are susceptible of physical delivery (&#147;Physical Property&#148;):</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(i)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>transfer of possession thereof to the Trustee, endorsed to, or registered in the name of, the Trustee or its nominee or endorsed in blank;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(b)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>with respect to a certificated security:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(i)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>delivery thereof in bearer form to the Indenture Collateral Agent; or</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(ii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>delivery thereof in registered form to the Indenture Collateral Agent and</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(A)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the certificate is endorsed to the Indenture Collateral Agent or in blank by effective endorsement; or</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(B)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the certificate is registered in the name of the Indenture Collateral Agent, upon original issue or registration of transfer by the Issuer;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(c)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>with respect to an uncertificated security:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(i)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the delivery of the uncertificated security to the Indenture Collateral Agent; or</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(ii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the Issuer has agreed that it will comply with instructions originated by the Indenture Collateral Agent without further consent by the registered owner; </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(d)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>with respect to any security issued by the U.S. Treasury that is a book entry security held through the Federal Reserve System pursuant to Federal book-entry regulations: </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(i)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>a Federal Reserve Bank by book entry credits the book-entry security to the securities account (as defined in 31 CFR Part 357) of a participant (as defined in 31 CFR Part 357) which is also a securities intermediary; and</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(ii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the participant indicates by book entry that the book entry security has been credited to the Indenture Collateral Agent securities account; and</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(e)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>with respect to a security entitlement:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(i)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the Indenture Collateral Agent becomes the entitlement holder; or</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(ii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the securities intermediary has agreed that it will comply with entitlement orders originated by the Indenture Collateral Agent without further consent by the entitlement holder.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(f)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>For the purpose of &nbsp;(b) and (c) hereof &#147;delivery&#148; means:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(i)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>with respect to a certificated security:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(A)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the Indenture Collateral Agent acquires possession thereof;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(B)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>another person (other than a securities intermediary) either acquires possession thereof on behalf of the Indenture Collateral Agent or, having previously acquired possession thereof, acknowledges that it holds for the Indenture Collateral Agent; or</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(C)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>a securities intermediary acting on behalf of the Indenture Collateral Agent acquires possession thereof, only if the certificate is in registered form and has been specially endorsed to the Indenture Collateral Agent by an effective endorsement;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(ii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>with respect to an uncertificated security:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(A)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the issuer registers the Indenture Collateral Agent as the registered owner, upon original issue or registration of transfer; or</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(B)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>another person (other than a securities intermediary) either becomes the registered owner thereof on behalf of the Indenture Collateral Agent or, having previously become the registered owner, acknowledges that it holds for the Indenture Collateral Agent;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(g)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>for purposes of this definition, except as otherwise indicated, the following terms shall have the meaning assigned to each such term in the UCC:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(i)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;certificated security&#148;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(ii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;effective endorsement&#148;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(iii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;entitlement holder&#148;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(iv)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;instrument&#148;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(v)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;securities account&#148;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(vi)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;securities entitlement&#148;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(vii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;securities intermediary&#148;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(viii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;uncertificated security&#148;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(h)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>in each case of Delivery contemplated herein, the Indenture Collateral Agent shall make appropriate notations on its records, and shall cause the same to be made on the records of its nominees, indicating that securities are held in trust pursuant to and as provided in this Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Depository Agreement&#148; means the Note Depository Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Determination Date&#148; means, with respect to any Distribution Date, the fifth Business Day immediately preceding such Distribution Date.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Discounted Receivable&#148; means each of the 22 Initial Receivables that would have had an interest rate of less than 3.99% if not for the discounting of these Receivables by the Seller as of the Initial Cutoff Date and each of the Subsequent Receivables that would have an interest rate of less than 3.99% if not for the discounting of these Receivables as of the applicable Subsequent Cutoff Date.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Distribution Amount&#148; means, with respect to any Distribution Date, the sum of (i) the Available Funds for the immediately preceding Determination Date, (ii) the Note Policy Claim Amount, if any, received by the Trustee with respect to such Distribution Date and (iii) amounts deposited by the Security Insurer as an Insurer Optional Deposit, if any.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Distribution Date&#148; means, with respect to each Monthly Period, the fifteenth day of the following calendar month, or if such day is not a Business Day, the immediately following Business Day, commencing in January 2005.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Draw Date&#148; means, with respect to any Distribution Date, the second Business Day immediately preceding such Distribution Date. </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Eligible Deposit Account&#148; means either (a) an account with an Eligible Institution or (b) a segregated trust account with the corporate trust department of a depository institution organized under the laws of the United States of America or any one of the states thereof or the District of Columbia (or any domestic branch of a foreign bank), having corporate trust powers and acting as trustee for funds deposited in such account, so long as any of the securities of such depository institution have a credit rating from each Rating Agency in one of its generic rating categories which signifies investment grade.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Eligible Institution&#148; means (a) the corporate trust department of the Trustee or any other entity specified in this Agreement or (b) a depository institution organized under the laws of the United States of America, or any one of the states thereof or the District of Columbia (or any domestic branch of a foreign bank), which (i) has either (A) a long term unsecured debt rating of &#147;AA-&#148; or better by Standard &amp; Poor&#146;s and &#147;Aa2&#148; or better by Moody&#146;s or (B) a certificate of deposit rating of &#147;A 1+&#148; or better by Standard &amp; Poor&#146;s and &#147;Prime 1&#148; or better by Moody&#146;s, or any other short term or certificate of deposit rating acceptable to the Rating Agencies and to the Security Insurer and (ii) whose deposits are insured by the FDIC. &nbsp;If so qualified under clause (b) above, the Ow
ner Trustee or the Trustee may be considered an Eligible Institution.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Eligible Investments&#148; mean book entry securities, negotiable instruments or securities represented by instruments in bearer or registered form which evidence:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(a)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>direct obligations of, and obligations fully guaranteed as to timely payment by, the United States of America;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(b)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>demand deposits, time deposits or certificates of deposit of any depository institution or trust company incorporated under the laws of the United States of America, or any state thereof or the District of Columbia (or any domestic branch of a foreign bank) and subject to supervision and examination by Federal or state banking or depository institution authorities (including depository receipts issued by any such institution or trust company as custodian with respect to any obligation referred to in clause (a) above or portion of such obligation for the benefit of the holders of such depository receipts); <U>provided</U>, <U>however</U>, that at the time of the investment or contractual commitment to invest therein (which shall be deemed to be made again each time funds are reinvested following each Distribution Date), the commercial paper or other shor
t term senior unsecured debt obligations (other than such obligations the rating of which is based on the credit of a Person other than such depository institution or trust company) of such depository institution or trust company shall have a credit rating from Standard &amp; Poor&#146;s of &#147;A 1+&#148; and from Moody&#146;s of &#147;Prime 1&#148;;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(c)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>commercial paper having, at the time of the investment or contractual commitment to invest therein, a rating from Standard &amp; Poor&#146;s of &#147;A 1+&#148; and from Moody&#146;s of &#147;Prime 1&#148;;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(d)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>investments in money market funds (including funds for which the Trustee or the Owner Trustee or any of their respective Affiliates is investment manager or advisor) having a rating from Standard &amp; Poor&#146;s of &#147;AAA m&#148; or &#147;AAAm G&#148; and from Moody&#146;s of &#147;Aaa&#148; and having been approved by the Security Insurer;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(e)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>bankers&#146; acceptances issued by any depository institution or trust company referred to in clause (b) above;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(f)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>repurchase obligations with respect to any security that is a direct obligation of, or fully guaranteed by, the United States of America or any agency or instrumentality thereof the obligations of which are backed by the full faith and credit of the United States of America, in either case entered into with a depository institution or trust company (acting as principal) referred to in clause (b) above;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(g)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>any demand deposit in a trust account maintained by The Bank of New York; provided that such deposits shall consist of direct obligations of, and obligations guaranteed as to timely payment by, The Bank of New York; provided, further, that The Bank of New York is rated at least &#147;A-1&#148; by Standard &amp; Poor&#146;s and that such deposits shall not represent more than 20% of the outstanding amount of the Notes; and</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(h)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>any other investment which would satisfy the Rating Agency Condition and is consistent with the ratings of the Notes and which, so long as no Insurer Default shall have occurred and be continuing, has been approved by the Security Insurer.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>Any of the foregoing Eligible Investments may be purchased by or through the Owner Trustee or the Trustee or any of their Affiliates.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;FDIC&#148; means the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Final Scheduled Distribution Date&#148; means with respect to (i) the Class A 1 Notes, the December 2005 Distribution Date, (ii) the Class A 2 Notes, the September 2007 Distribution Date, (iii) the Class A-3 Notes, the April 2009 Distribution Date and (iv) the Class A-4 Notes, the August 2012 Distribution Date.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Final Scheduled Maturity Date&#148; means June 30, 2012.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Financed Vehicle&#148; means a new or used automobile or light-truck, together with all accessions thereto, securing an Obligor&#146;s indebtedness under the respective Receivable.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;First Payment Default&#148; means any Receivable for which the first scheduled payment remains unpaid as of the date upon which the second scheduled payment has become due.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Funding Period&#148; means the period beginning on and including the Closing Date and ending on the first to occur of (a) the Distribution Date on which the amount on deposit in the Pre-Funding Account (after giving effect to any transfers therefrom in connection with the transfer of Subsequent Receivables to the Issuer on such Distribution Date) is less than $2,500, (b) the date on which a Servicer Default occurs or an Event of Default under the Indenture occurs and (c) the close of business on February 15, 2005.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Indemnification Agreement&#148; means the Indemnification Agreement dated as of December 2, 2004 by and among the Security Insurer, the Seller, the Representative and Citigroup Global Markets Inc.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Indenture&#148; means the Indenture dated as of December 1, 2004 among the Issuer, the Indenture Collateral Agent and the Trustee, as the same may be amended and supplemented from time to time.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Indenture Collateral Agent&#148; means the Person acting as Indenture Collateral Agent under the Indenture, its successors in interest and any successor Indenture Collateral Agent under the Indenture.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Initial Cutoff Date&#148; means as to any Initial Receivable, December 1, 2004.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Initial Receivables&#148; means the Receivables conveyed to the Trust on the Closing Date.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Initial Receivables Property&#148; shall have the meaning specified in Section 2.1.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Insolvency Event&#148; means, with respect to a specified Person, (a) the filing of a petition against such Person or the entry of a decree or order for relief by a court having jurisdiction in the premises in respect of such Person or any substantial part of its property in an involuntary case under any applicable federal or state bankruptcy, insolvency or other similar law now or hereafter in effect, or appointing a receiver, liquidator, assignee, custodian, trustee, sequestrator, or similar official for such Person or for any substantial part of its property, or ordering the winding up or liquidation of such Person&#146;s affairs, and such petition, decree or order shall remain unstayed and in effect for a period of 60 consecutive days; or (b) the commencement by such Person of a voluntary case under any applicable federal or state bankruptcy, i
nsolvency or other similar law now or hereafter in effect, or the consent by such Person to the entry of an order for relief in an involuntary case under any such law, or the consent by such Person to the appointment of or taking possession by, a receiver, liquidator, assignee, custodian, trustee, sequestrator, or similar official for such Person or for any substantial part of its property, or the making by such Person of any general assignment for the benefit of creditors, or the failure by such Person generally to pay its debts as such debts become due, or the taking of action by such Person in furtherance of any of the foregoing.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Insolvency Proceeds&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in Section 9.1(b) of this Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Insurance Agreement&#148; means the Insurance and Reimbursement Agreement dated as of December 15, 2004 among the Security Insurer, the Trustee, the Servicer, Franklin Resources and the Seller.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Insurance Agreement Trigger Event &#147; means an &#147;Insurance Agreement Trigger Event&#148; as defined in the Insurance Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Insurance Policy&#148; means, with respect to a Receivable, any insurance policy (including the insurance policies described in Section 4.4 of this Agreement) benefiting the holder of the Receivable providing loss or physical damage, credit life, credit disability, theft, mechanical breakdown or similar coverage with respect to the Financed Vehicle or the Obligor.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Insurer&#146;s Agent&#148; means The Bank of New York.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Insurer Default&#148; means the occurrence and continuance of any of the following events:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(a)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the Security Insurer shall have failed to make a &nbsp;payment required under the Note Policy in accordance with its terms;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(b)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the Security Insurer shall have (i) filed a petition or commenced any case or proceeding under any provision or chapter of the United States Bankruptcy Code or any other similar federal or state law relating to insolvency, bankruptcy, rehabilitation, liquidation or reorganization, (ii) made a general assignment for the benefit of its creditors or (iii) had an order for relief entered against it under the United States Bankruptcy Code or any other similar federal or state law relating to insolvency, bankruptcy, rehabilitation, liquidation or reorganization which is final and nonappealable; or </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(c)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>a court of competent jurisdiction, the New York Department of Insurance or other competent regulatory authority shall have entered a final and nonappealable order, judgment or decree (i) appointing a custodian, trustee, agent, liquidator, rehabilitator or receiver for the Security Insurer or for all or any material portion of its property or (ii) authorizing the taking of possession by a custodian, trustee, agent, liquidator, rehabilitator or receiver of the Security Insurer (or the taking of possession of all or any material portion of the property of the Security Insurer); provided, however, that the Security Insurer&#146;s rights shall be immediately reinstated upon cure of such Insurer Default.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Insurer Optional Deposit&#148; has the meaning specified in Section 5.10 of this Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Interest Period&#148; means, with respect to any Distribution Date (i) with respect to the Class A-1 Notes, from and including the most recent Distribution Date on which interest has been paid (or from and including the Closing Date in the case of the first Distribution Date) to but excluding the following Distribution Date and (ii) with respect to each Class of Notes other than the Class A-1 Notes, from and including the fifteenth day of the calendar month preceding each Distribution Date (or from and including the Closing Date in the case of the first Distribution Date) to but excluding, the fifteenth day of the following calendar month.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&nbsp;&#147;Interest Rate&#148; means, with respect to (i) the Class A 1 Notes, 2.49% per annum, (ii) the Class A 2 Notes, 3.07% per annum, (iii) the Class A-3 Notes, 3.48% per annum and (iv) the Class A-4 Notes, 3.93% per annum (in the case of the Class A-1 Notes, computed on the actual number of days elapsed and a 360-day year, and in the case of all other Classes of Notes, computed on the basis of a 360 day year consisting of twelve 30 day months).</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Investment Earnings&#148; means, with respect to any Distribution Date, the investment earnings (net of losses and investment expenses) on amounts on deposit in the Trust Accounts (other than the Spread Account) and the Certificate Distribution Account.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Issuer&#148; means Franklin Auto Trust 2004-2. </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Lien&#148; means a security interest, lien, charge, pledge, equity, or encumbrance of any kind, other than tax liens, mechanics&#146; liens and any liens that attach to the respective Receivable by operation of law as a result of any act or omission by the related Obligor.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Lien Certificate&#148; means, with respect to a Financed Vehicle, an original certificate of title, certificate of lien or other notification issued by the Registrar of Titles of the applicable state to a secured party which indicates that the lien of the secured party on the Financed Vehicle is recorded on the original certificate of title. &nbsp;In any jurisdiction in which the original certificate of title is required to be given to the Obligor, the term &#147;Lien Certificate&#148; shall mean only a certificate or notification, if any, issued to a secured party.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Liquidated Receivable&#148; means, with respect to any Determination Date, a Receivable as to which, as of the last day of the related Monthly Period, any of the following events has occurred (i.e., the earliest to occur of the following events): &nbsp;(i) the Servicer has determined in good faith that all amounts it expects to recover have been received, (ii) other than with respect to a Receivable for which the related Obligor is subject to a bankruptcy proceeding, more than $25.00 of a scheduled payment is 120 or more days delinquent and the Financed Vehicle has been in the Servicer&#146;s possession for a period of at least 45 days, (iii) more than $25.00 of a scheduled payment is 120 or more days delinquent, the Servicer has not repossessed the Financed Vehicle and the Obligor has not declared bankruptcy or (iv) the Financed Vehicle has been s
old and the proceeds received. &nbsp;In any case, if more than $25.00 of principal and interest on a Receivable as of the last day of the related Monthly Period is 180 or more days delinquent, then such Receivable shall be a Liquidated Receivable and shall have a Principal Balance of zero.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Mandatory Partial Prepayment Date&#148; means the Distribution Date on which the Funding Period ends or, if the Funding Period does not end on a Distribution Date, then the Distribution Date immediately following the last day of the Funding Period. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Month-End Pool Balance&#148; means, as of the end of any Monthly Period (other than the initial Monthly Period), the Pool Balance for the immediately preceding Monthly Period, or in the case of the initial Monthly Period the Original Pool Balance, less an amount equal to the sum of the following amounts with respect to the related Monthly Period, computed in accordance with the Simple Interest Method: &nbsp;(i) that portion of all collections on Receivables allocable to principal, including full and partial principal prepayments, received during such Monthly Period, (ii) the Principal Balance of each Receivable that was purchased or repurchased by Franklin Capital, the Seller, the Servicer or any affiliate of any of them as of the last day of such Monthly Period, (iii) at the option of the Security Insurer, the outstanding Principal Balance of thos
e Receivables that were required to be repurchased by the Seller and Franklin Capital during such Monthly Period but were not so repurchased, (iv) without duplication of amounts in clause (ii), the Principal Balance of each Receivable that became a Liquidated Receivable during such Monthly Period and (v) the aggregate amount of Cram Down Losses during such Monthly Period.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Monthly Capitalized Interest Amount&#148; means with respect to the January 2005 Distribution Date and the February 2005 Distribution Date, an amount equal to (1) the product of (x) a fraction, the numerator of which is (a) for the January 2005 Distribution Date, 30 and (b) for the February 2005 Distribution Date, 30 and the denominator of which is 360, (y) the weighted average of each Interest Rate and (z) the difference between the sum of the aggregate principal amount of the Notes immediately prior to the related Distribution Date and the Pool Balance as of (a) for the January 2005 Distribution Date, the Initial Cutoff Date and (b) for the February 2005 Distribution Date, January 31, 2005, plus (2) the premium paid to the Security Insurer for such Distribution Date allocable to the balance in the Pre-Funding Account at the beginning of the relat
ed Monthly Period minus (3) the actual Pre-Funding Earnings on deposit in the Pre-Funding Account on such Distribution Date.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Monthly Period&#148; means, with respect to each Distribution Date, the calendar month preceding the month in which such Distribution Date occurs.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Moody&#146;s&#148; means Moody&#146;s Investors Service, Inc., or its successor.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Net Liquidation Proceeds&#148; means, with respect to Liquidated Receivables, (i) proceeds from the disposition of the Financed Vehicles relating to the Liquidated Receivables, less reasonable Servicer out-of-pocket costs, including repossession and resale expenses not already deducted from such proceeds, and any amounts required by law to be remitted to the Obligor, (ii) any proceeds from an Insurance Policy or (iii) other monies received from the Obligor or otherwise.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Non-Prime Receivables&#148; means those Receivables indicated on Schedule A hereto as non prime.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Note Distribution Account&#148; means the account designated as such, established and maintained pursuant to Section 5.1(a)(ii) of this Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Note Policy&#148; means the financial guarantee insurance policy issued by the Security Insurer to the Trustee for the benefit of the Noteholders with respect to the Notes, including any endorsements thereto, in the form of Exhibit E to the Indenture.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Note Policy Claim Amount&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in Section 5.4(a) of this Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Note Pool Factor&#148; means, with respect to each Class of Notes and the close of business on any Distribution Date, a seven digit decimal figure equal to the outstanding principal amount of such Class of Notes as of such Distribution Date after giving effect to principal distributions on such date divided by the original outstanding principal amount of such Class of Notes. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Noteholder&#148; or &#147;Holder&#148; means the Person in whose name a Note is registered on the Note Register.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Noteholders&#146; Interest Carryover Shortfall&#148; means, with respect to the first Distribution Date, zero, and with respect to any other Distribution Date, the excess of the Noteholders&#146; Interest Distributable Amount for the preceding Distribution Date, over the amount in respect of interest that was actually deposited in the Note Distribution Account on such preceding Distribution Date, plus interest on the amount of interest due but not paid to Noteholders on the preceding Distribution Date, to the extent permitted by law, at the respective Interest Rate borne by each Class of Notes from the fifteenth day of the calendar month preceding such Distribution Date to but excluding the fifteenth day of the following calendar month.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Noteholders&#146; Interest Distributable Amount&#148; means, with respect to any Distribution Date, the sum of the Noteholders&#146; Monthly Interest Distributable Amount for such Distribution Date and the Noteholders&#146; Interest Carryover Shortfall for such Distribution Date. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Noteholders&#146; Monthly Interest Distributable Amount&#148; means, with respect to any Distribution Date and any Class of Notes, interest accrued during the related Interest Period at the Interest Rate borne by such Class of Notes on the outstanding principal amount of the Notes of such Class immediately preceding such Distribution Date, calculated (i) in the case of the Class A-1 Notes, on the basis of the actual number of days elapsed in the related Interest Period and a 360-day year and (ii) in the case of all other Classes of Notes, on the basis of a 360-day year consisting of twelve 30 day months.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Notes&#148; means the Class A 1 Notes, the Class A-2 Notes, the Class A-3 Notes and the Class A-4 Notes.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Obligor&#148; on a Receivable means the purchaser or co purchasers of the Financed Vehicle and any other Person who owes payments under the Receivable.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Officer&#146;s Certificate&#148; means a certificate signed by the (a) chairman of the board, the president, any executive vice president or any vice president and (b) any executive vice president, vice president, treasurer, assistant treasurer, controller, secretary or assistant secretary of the Representative, the Seller or the Servicer, as appropriate.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Opinion of Counsel&#148; means one or more written opinions of counsel who may be an employee of or counsel to the Representatives, the Seller or the Servicer, which counsel shall be reasonably acceptable to the addressees.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Original Pool Balance&#148; means the sum of (a) the aggregate Principal Balance of the Initial Receivables as of the Initial Cutoff Date plus (b) the aggregate Principal Balance of the Subsequent Receivables as of their respective Subsequent Cutoff Dates.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Owner Trust Estate&#148; has the meaning assigned to such term in the Trust Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Owner Trustee&#148; means Deutsche Bank Trust Company Delaware, not in its individual capacity but solely as Owner Trustee under the Trust Agreement, its successors in interest or any successor Owner Trustee under the Trust Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Person&#148; means any individual, corporation, estate, partnership, joint venture, association, joint stock company, trust (including any beneficiary thereof), unincorporated organization or government or any agency or political subdivision thereof.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Physical Property&#148; has the meaning assigned to such term in the definition of &#147;Delivery&#148; above.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Pool Balance&#148; means, as of the end of any Monthly Period, the aggregate Principal Balance of the Receivables (exclusive of Liquidated Receivables) at the end of such Monthly Period, after giving effect to all payments received from Obligors and any Purchase Amounts to be remitted by Franklin Capital, the Seller or Servicer, as the case may be, on the Determination Date following such Monthly Period and all losses, including Cram Down Losses, realized on Receivables liquidated during such Monthly Period.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Pre-Funded Amount&#148; means, with respect to any Distribution Date, the amount on deposit in the Pre Funding Account, (exclusive of Pre-Funding Earnings) which initially shall be the Pre-Funding Account Initial Deposit. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Pre-Funding Account&#148; has the meaning specified in Section 5.1(a)(iii).</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Pre-Funding Account Initial Deposit&#148; means $58,000,000 deposited in the Pre-Funding Account on the Closing Date. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Pre-Funding Earnings&#148; means any investment earnings (net of losses) on amounts on deposit in the Pre-Funding Account.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Prepayment Amount&#148; means, as of the Mandatory Partial Prepayment Date, after giving effect to any transfer of Subsequent Receivables on such date, an amount equal to the Pre-Funded Amount on deposit in the Pre-Funding Account as of the Mandatory Partial Prepayment Date.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Prime Receivables&#148; means those Receivables indicated on Schedule A hereto as prime.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Principal Balance&#148; means, with respect to any Receivable, as of any date, the Amount Financed (as reduced for a Discounted Receivable by the amount discounted as of the applicable Cutoff Date) minus (i) that portion of all amounts received on or prior to such date and allocable to principal in accordance with the terms of the Receivable (and in the case of a Discounted Receivable, the discounting of the Receivable) and (ii) any Cram Down Loss in respect of such Receivable.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Principal Distributable Amount&#148; means, with respect to any Distribution Date, the excess of (i) the aggregate outstanding principal balance of the Notes as of the preceding Distribution Date (after giving effect to distributions thereon) or in the case of the first Distribution Date, as of the Closing Date, over (ii) the Month-End Pool Balance plus for each Distribution Date preceding the Mandatory Partial Prepayment Date, the amount on deposit in the Pre-Funding Account, in each case as of the end of the preceding Monthly Period, minus $25,000; provided, however, that, on the Final Scheduled Distribution Date for any Class of Notes, the Principal Distributable Amount will not be less than the outstanding principal balance of such Class of Notes.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Purchase Agreement&#148; means the Purchase Agreement dated as of December 1, 2004 between the Seller and Franklin Capital pursuant to which the Seller acquired the Initial Receivables, as such Agreement may be amended from time to time.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Purchase Amount&#148; means, with respect to any Receivable required to be repurchased or purchased pursuant to Section 3.2 or Section 4.7 of this Agreement or as to which the Servicer has exercised the purchase option pursuant to Section 9.1(a) of this Agreement, an amount equal to the sum of (i) 100% of the Principal Balance thereof and (ii) all accrued and unpaid interest thereon (including one month&#146;s interest thereon, in the month of payment, at the APR less, so long as Franklin Capital is the Servicer, the Base Servicing Fee) after giving effect to the receipt of any amounts collected (from whatever source) on such Receivable, if any.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Purchased Receivable&#148; means a Receivable purchased as of the close of business on the last day of a Monthly Period by the Servicer pursuant to Section 4.7 of this Agreement, repurchased by the Seller, or the Representative pursuant to Section 3.2 of this Agreement or purchased by Franklin Capital pursuant to the Purchase Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Rating Agency&#148; means Moody&#146;s and Standard &amp; Poor&#146;s. &nbsp;If no such organization or successor maintains a rating on the Notes, &#147;Rating Agency&#148; shall be a nationally recognized statistical rating organization or other comparable Person designated by the Seller and acceptable to the Security Insurer (so long as an Insurer Default shall not have occurred and be continuing), notice of which designation shall be given in writing by the Servicer to the Trustee, the Owner Trustee, the Security Insurer and the Servicer.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Rating Agency Condition&#148; means, with respect to any action or amendment that either (i) each Rating Agency confirms in writing that such amendment will not result in a reduction or withdrawal of such rating or (ii) none of the Rating Agencies, within 10 days after receipt of notice of such action or amendment, shall have notified the Seller, the Servicer or the Owner Trustee in writing that such action or amendment will result in a reduction or withdrawal of the then current rating of any Class of the Notes.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Realized Losses&#148; means, with respect to any Receivable that becomes a Liquidated Receivable, the excess of the Principal Balance of such Liquidated Receivable (immediately prior to it becoming a Liquidated Receivable) over the Net Liquidation Proceeds to the extent allocable to principal.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Receivable&#148; means any Contract listed on Schedule A, as such Schedule A shall be amended from time to time to reflect the transfer of Subsequent Receivables to the Trust (which Schedule may be in electronic form or in the form of microfiche).</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Receivable Files&#148; means the documents specified in Section 3.3 of this Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Record Date&#148; means, with respect to each Distribution Date, the day immediately preceding such Distribution Date, unless otherwise specified in this Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Registrar of Titles&#148; means, with respect to any state, the governmental agency or body responsible for the registration of, and the issuance of certificates of title relating to, motor vehicles and liens thereon.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Representative&#148; means Franklin Resources, Inc., a Delaware corporation, and its successors and assigns.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Schedule of Receivables&#148; has the meaning assigned thereto in Section 3.1(d) of this Agreement.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Security Insurer&#148; means MBIA Insurance Corporation, a stock insurance company incorporated under the laws of the State of New York, or any successor thereto, as issuer of the Note Policy.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;Security Insurer Defense Costs&#148; means all costs and expenses of the Security Insurer (including costs and expenses of the Owner Trustee that the Security Insurer may have paid) in connection with any action, proceeding or investigation that could materially adversely affect the Trust or the Owner Trust Estate or the rights or obligations of the Security Insurer under any of the Basic Documents or under the Note Policy, including, without limitation, any judgment or settlement entered into affecting the Security Insurer or the Security Insurer&#146;s interests, together with interest thereon at a rate equal to the Base Rate (as defined in the Insurance Agreement) from time to time in effect plus 1%; provided, however, that the Security Insurer Defense Costs shall not constitute a claim against the Trust.</P>
