<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:144pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Acknowledgment of Parties; Security Insurer Defense Costs</U>. &nbsp;Each of the Issuer, Seller, Franklin Capital (in its individual capacity and as Servicer) and Franklin Resources (in its individual capacity and as Representative) acknowledge Section 4.6 of the Trust Agreement, and agree that the Trust shall reimburse the Security Insurer for all Security Insurer Defense Costs pursuant to Section 5.6(a) hereof.</P>
<HR style="padding-top:7.2pt; padding-bottom:7.2pt; color:#000000" noshade size=1.333>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Agreement to be duly executed and delivered by their respective duly authorized officers as of the day and year first above written.</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=right>Exhibit A</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>FORM OF</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>SUBSEQUENT TRANSFER AGREEMENT</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>THIS SUBSEQUENT TRANSFER AGREEMENT is dated as of _______________, 2005 (as amended, this &#147;Agreement&#148;) among FRANKLIN AUTO TRUST 2004-2, a Delaware statutory trust (the &#147;Issuer&#148;), FRANKLIN RECEIVABLES LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (the &#147;Seller&#148;), FRANKLIN CAPITAL CORPORATION, a Utah corporation (the &#147;Servicer&#148; or &#147;Franklin Capital&#148;), and FRANKLIN RESOURCES, INC., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Franklin Resources&#148; or the &#147;Representative&#148;), and is made pursuant to the Sale and Servicing Agreement referred to below.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>W I T N E S E T H:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>WHEREAS, the Issuer, the Seller, the Servicer and Franklin Resources are parties to the Sale and Servicing Agreement dated as of December 1, 2004 (as amended, modified or supplemented, the &#147;Sale and Servicing Agreement&#148;);</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>WHEREAS, pursuant to the Sale and Servicing Agreement, the Seller wishes to convey the Subsequent Receivables referred to in Section 2 below to the Issuer; and</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>WHEREAS, the Issuer is willing to accept such conveyance subject to the terms and conditions hereof.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>NOW, THEREFORE, the Issuer, the Seller and the Servicer hereby agree as follows:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION l.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Defined Terms</U>. &nbsp;Capitalized terms used herein shall have the meanings ascribed to them in the Sale and Servicing Agreement unless otherwise defined herein.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;<U>Subsequent Cutoff Date&#148;</U> shall mean, with respect to the Subsequent Receivables conveyed hereby, [January 1, 2005] [February 1, 2005].</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>&#147;<U>Subsequent Transfer Date&#148;</U> shall mean, with respect to the Subsequent Receivables conveyed hereby, ____________, 2005.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 2.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Schedule of Receivables</U>. &nbsp;Annexed hereto as Schedule A is a supplement to Schedule A to the Sale and Servicing Agreement listing the Receivables that constitute the Subsequent Receivables to be conveyed pursuant to this Agreement on the Subsequent Transfer Date.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 3.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Conveyance of Subsequent Receivables</U>. &nbsp;In consideration of the Issuer&#146;s delivery to or upon the order of the Seller of $_______________, the Seller does hereby sell, transfer, assign, set over and otherwise convey to the Issuer, without recourse (except as expressly provided in the Sale and Servicing Agreement), all right, title and interest of the Seller in and to:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(i)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the Subsequent Receivables, and all moneys due thereon, on or after the related Subsequent Cutoff Date;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(ii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the security interests in the Financed Vehicles granted by Obligors pursuant to the Subsequent Receivables and any other interest of the Seller in such Financed Vehicles;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(iii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>any proceeds with respect to the Subsequent Receivables from claims on any physical damage, credit life or disability insurance policies covering Financed Vehicles or Obligors and any proceeds from the liquidation of such Subsequent Receivables;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(iv)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>any proceeds from any Subsequent Receivables repurchased by a Dealer, pursuant to a Dealer Agreement, as a result of a breach of a representation or warranty in the related Dealer Agreement; </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(v)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>any extended warranty service contracts on the related Financed Vehicles;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(vi)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the related Receivables Files;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(vii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>its rights and benefits, but none of its obligations or burdens, under the related Subsequent Purchase Agreement, including the delivery requirements, representations and warranties and the cure and repurchase obligations of Franklin Capital under such Subsequent Purchase Agreement; and</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(viii)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>the proceeds of any and all of the foregoing.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 4.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Representations and Warranties of the Seller</U>. &nbsp;The Seller hereby represents and warrants to the Issuer as of the date of this Agreement and as of the Subsequent Transfer Date that:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(a)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Organization and Good Standing</U>. &nbsp;The Seller is duly organized and validly existing as a Delaware limited liability company with power and authority to own its properties and to conduct its business as such properties are currently owned and such business is presently conducted, and had at all relevant times, and has, the power, authority and legal right to acquire and own the Receivables.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(b)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Due Qualification</U>. &nbsp;The Seller is duly qualified to do business as a limited liability company in good standing, and has obtained all necessary licenses and approvals in all jurisdictions in which the ownership or lease of property, including the Receivables, or the conduct of its business shall require such qualifications.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(c)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Power and Authority of the Seller</U>. &nbsp;The Seller has the power and authority to execute and deliver this Agreement and to perform its obligations under each of the Basic Documents to which the Seller is a party; the Seller has full power and authority to sell and assign the property to be sold and assigned to and deposited with the Issuer and the Seller has duly authorized such sale and assignment to the Issuer by all necessary &nbsp;action; and the execution, delivery and performance of each of the Basic Documents to which the Seller is a party has been duly authorized by the Seller by all necessary action.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(d)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Binding Obligation</U>. &nbsp;This Agreement and each of the Basic Documents to which the Seller is a party constitute legal, valid and binding obligations of the Seller, enforceable in accordance with its terms, subject to applicable bankruptcy, insolvency, moratorium, fraudulent conveyance, reorganization and similar laws now or hereafter in effect relating to creditors&#146; rights generally and subject to general principles of equity (whether applied in a proceeding at law or in equity).</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(e)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>No Violation</U>. &nbsp;The consummation of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement and the fulfillment of the terms hereof and thereof do not result in any breach of any of the terms and provisions of, nor constitute (with or without notice or lapse of time or both) a default under, the certificate of formation or limited liability company agreement of the Seller, or any indenture, agreement or other instrument to which the Seller is a party or by which it is bound; nor result in the creation or imposition of any Lien upon any of its properties pursuant to the terms of any such indenture, agreement or other instrument (other than pursuant to the Basic Documents); nor violate any law or, to the best of its knowledge, any order, rule or regulation applicable to the Seller of any cour
t or of any federal or state regulatory body, administrative agency or other governmental instrumentality having jurisdiction over the Seller or its properties.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(f)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>No Proceedings</U>. &nbsp;There are no proceedings or investigations pending against the Seller or, to its best knowledge, threatened against the Seller, before any court, regulatory body, administrative agency or other governmental instrumentality having jurisdiction over the Seller or its properties: &nbsp;(i) asserting the invalidity of this Agreement or any of the Basic Documents, the Notes or the Certificates, (ii) seeking to prevent the issuance of the Notes or the Certificates or the consummation of any of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement or any of the Basic Documents, (iii) seeking any determination or ruling that could reasonably be expected to have a material and adverse effect on the performance by the Seller of its obligations under, or the validity or enforceabil
ity of, the Basic Documents, the Notes or the Certificates or (iv) that might adversely affect the federal income tax attributes of the Issuer, the Notes or the Certificates.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(g)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Principal Balance</U>. &nbsp;The aggregate Principal Balance of the Subsequent Receivables listed on Schedule A annexed hereto, which Schedule A shall supplement Schedule A to the Sale and Servicing Agreement, and conveyed to the Issuer pursuant to this Agreement and the Sale and Servicing Agreement as of the Subsequent Cutoff Date is $_______________.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 5.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Conditions Precedent</U>. &nbsp;The obligation of the Issuer to acquire the Receivables hereunder is subject to the satisfaction, on or prior to the Subsequent Transfer Date, of the following conditions precedent:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(a)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Representations and Warranties</U>. &nbsp;Each of the representations and warranties made by the Seller in Section 4 of this Agreement and in Section 3.1 of the Sale and Servicing Agreement shall be true and correct as of the date of this Agreement and as of the Subsequent Transfer Date.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(b)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Sale and Servicing Agreement Conditions</U>. &nbsp;Each of the conditions set forth in Section 2.2(b) of the Sale and Servicing Agreement shall have been satisfied.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>(c)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Additional Information</U>. &nbsp;The Seller shall have delivered to the Issuer such information as was reasonably requested by the Issuer and the Security Insurer to satisfy themselves as to (i) the accuracy of the representations and warranties set forth in Section 4 of this Agreement and in Section 3.1 of the Sale and Servicing Agreement and (ii) the satisfaction of the conditions set forth in this Section 5.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 6. &nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Ratification of Agreement</U>. &nbsp;As supplemented by this Agreement, the Sale and Servicing Agreement is in all respects ratified and confirmed and the Sale and Servicing Agreement as so supplemented by this Agreement shall be read, taken and construed as one and the same instrument.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 7.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><U>Counterparts</U>. &nbsp;This Agreement may be executed in two or more counterparts (and by different parties in separate counterparts), each of which shall be an original but all of which together shall constitute one and the same instrument.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>SECTION 8.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:108pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><B><U>GOVERNING LAW</U>. &nbsp;THIS AGREEMENT SHALL BE CONSTRUED IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE LAWS OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, WITHOUT REFERENCE TO ITS CONFLICT OF LAW PROVISIONS, AND THE OBLIGATIONS, RIGHTS AND REMEDIES OF THE PARTIES HEREUNDER SHALL BE DETERMINED IN ACCORDANCE WITH SUCH LAWS.</B></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><B>SECTION </B>9. &nbsp;<U>Third Party Beneficiary</U>. &nbsp;Each of the Security Insurer, the Indenture Trustee and the Indenture Collateral Agent and its successors and assigns shall be an express third party beneficiary of this Agreement. </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>Class A-4 3.93% Asset-Backed Notes</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Distribution Date:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>Monthly Period:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>Under the Sale and Servicing Agreement dated as of December 1, 2004 (the &#147;Sale and Servicing Agreement&#148;) among Franklin Capital Corporation, as servicer, Franklin Receivables LLC, as seller, Franklin Resources, Inc., as representative and Franklin Auto Trust 2004-2, as issuer, the Servicer is required to prepare certain information each month regarding current distributions to Noteholders and the performance of the Trust during the previous month. &nbsp;The information that is required to be prepared with respect to the Distribution Date and Monthly Period listed above is set forth below. &nbsp;Certain of the information is presented on the basis of an original principal amount of $1,000 per Note, and certain other information is presented based upon the aggregate amounts for the Trust as a whole. &nbsp;Capitalized terms used herein and not oth
erwise defined herein have the meanings assigned to those terms in the Sale and Servicing Agreement.</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">4. &nbsp;Extensions, Deferrals and Modifications.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:324pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">(a)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">The number of extensions and deferrals</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">granted by the Servicer during the</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:216pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">$________</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">(b)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">The aggregate principal balance (as of the end</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">of the Monthly Period) of all Contracts on which</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:216pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">$________</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">(c)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">The aggregate principal balance (as of the end of</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">the Monthly Period) of all Contracts on which </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:72pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">modifications has been granted by the Servicer</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">during the preceding Monthly Period</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:216pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">$________</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">The aggregate principal balance (as of the</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:216pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">$________</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">(b)</P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:216pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">$________</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>

<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">The aggregate amount of reimbursements to </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">the Security Insurer during the preceding Monthly Period</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:252pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">$________</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">(d)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:36pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">The number of Receivables that are delinquent </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">for over:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">30 days</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:252pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">_______</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">60 days</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:252pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">_______</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">90 days</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:252pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">_______</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:0pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:207pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:0pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:207pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=justify>6. &nbsp;Prefunding.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:67.5pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:207pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-31.5pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:67.5pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:207pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-31.5pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">(a)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:67.5pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:207pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">For Distribution Dates &nbsp;(if any) during the Funding Period, the remaining Pre Funded Amount and the amount in the Pre-Funding Account </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:67.5pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:207pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:688.5pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">$_______</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:67.5pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:207pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-31.5pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:67.5pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:207pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-31.5pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">(b)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:67.5pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:207pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">For Distribution Dates (if any) the remaining amount in the Pre-Funding Account</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:67.5pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:207pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:400.5pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">$_______</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:67.7pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:207.35pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-31.7pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:67.7pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:207.35pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:-31.7pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">(c)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:67.7pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:207.35pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">For the final Subsequent Transfer Date, the amount of any remaining Pre Funded Amount that has not been used to fund the purchase of Subsequent Receivables and is passed through as principal to Noteholders</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:67.7pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:207.35pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:1048.3pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">$_______</P>
<HR style="padding-top:7.2pt; padding-bottom:7.2pt; color:#000000" noshade size=1.333>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=right>Exhibit D</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>Form of Servicer&#146;s Certificate</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<HR style="padding-top:7.2pt; padding-bottom:7.2pt; color:#000000" noshade size=1.333>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=right>Exhibit E</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>Form of Note Policy</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center>(See Tab 21)</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>

<BODY LINK=#0000FF VLINK=#FF00FF ALINK=#FF0000>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:3.6pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=right><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:3.6pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center><B>MBIA INSURANCE CORPORATION</B></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:3.6pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center><B>FINANCIAL GUARANTEE INSURANCE POLICY</B></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center><B>December 15, 2004</B></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:3.6pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=center><BR></P>
<TABLE style="margin-left:0pt"><TR><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=191.6>&nbsp;</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=414.933><P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-right:0pt; margin-bottom:3.6pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000" align=right><B>Policy No. </B>&nbsp;<B>45449</B></P>
</TD></TR>
<TR><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=191.6>&nbsp;</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=414.933>&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=191.6><P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><B>Re:</B></P>
</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=414.933><P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><B>Franklin Auto Trust 2004-2 (the &#147;Trust&#148;)</B></P>
<P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><B>$45,000,000 Class A-1 2.49%Asset-Backed Notes; $58,000,000 Class A-2 3.07% Asset-Backed Notes; </B></P>
<P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><B>$64,000,000 Class A-3 3.48% Asset-Backed Notes; and</B></P>
<P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><B>$66,000,000 Class A-4 3.93% Asset-Backed Notes (collectively, the &#147;Notes&#148;). </B></P>
</TD></TR>
<TR><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=191.6>&nbsp;</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=414.933>&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=191.6><P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><B>Insured Obligation:</B></P>
</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=414.933><P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><B>Obligation to pay timely interest and principal on the Notes.</B></P>
</TD></TR>
<TR><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=191.6>&nbsp;</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=414.933>&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=191.6><P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><B>Beneficiary:</B></P>
</TD><TD style="padding-left:7.2pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:7.2pt; padding-bottom:0pt" align=left valign=top width=414.933><P style="margin:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><B>The Bank of New York, as indenture trustee (the &#147;Indenture Trustee&#148;) under the Indenture dated as of December 1, 2004 (the &#147;Indenture&#148;) between the Trust, The Bank of New York, as indenture collateral agent and as Indenture Trustee (together with any successor indenture trustee duly appointed and qualified under the Indenture) for the benefit of the Noteholders (as defined below).</B></P>
</TD></TR>
</TABLE>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:6pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><B>MBIA &nbsp;INSURANCE CORPORATION (&#147;MBIA&#148;)</B>, for consideration received, hereby unconditionally and irrevocably guarantees to the Indenture Trustee, subject only to the terms of this Financial Guarantee Insurance Policy (the &#147;Policy&#148;), payment of the Insured Obligation. &nbsp;MBIA agrees to pay to the Indenture Trustee, in respect of each Distribution Date, including the Final Scheduled Distribution Date, an amount equal to the sum of (i) an amount equal to the amount by which the Noteholders&#146; Interest Distributable Amount exceeds the Available Funds remaining to pay such amounts as provided in the Sale and Servicing Agreement (as defined below) and (ii) an amount equal to the amount by which the Principal Distributable Amount exceeds the Available Funds remaining to pay such amounts as provided in the Sale and Servicing Agreement (the &#1
47;Note Policy Claim Amount&#148;). &nbsp;MBIA also agrees to pay an amount equal to any Avoided Payment (as defined below). &nbsp;MBIA&#146;s obligations under this Policy will be discharged to the extent funds equal to the amounts described above are received by the Indenture Trustee or disbursed by MBIA as provided in this Policy, whether or not such funds are properly applied by the Indenture Trustee. &nbsp;Payments hereunder shall be made only at the time set forth in this Policy. &nbsp;This Policy will not guarantee payment of any amounts that become due on an accelerated basis as a result of (a) a default by the Trust, (b) the occurrence of an Event of Default under (and as defined in) the Indenture, or (c) any other cause. &nbsp;MBIA may elect, in its sole discretion, to pay in whole or in part such principal due upon acceleration, other than distributions of principal with respect to a class of Notes on the Final Scheduled Distribution Date therefor, which is guaranteed by MBIA as provided above. &n
bsp;This Policy does not cover shortfalls, if any, attributable to the liability of the Trust, the Indenture Trustee or indenture collateral agent for withholding taxes, if any (including interest and penalties in respect of such liability).</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:6pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined herein shall have the meanings assigned to them in the Sale and Servicing Agreement dated as of December 1, 2004 among Franklin Receivables LLC, as seller (the &#147;Seller&#148;), Franklin Capital Corporation, as servicer (the &#147;Servicer&#148;), Franklin Resources, Inc. (&#147;Resources&#148;), as representative, and the Trust (the &#147;Sale and Servicing Agreement&#148;).</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:6pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">As used herein the term &#147;Insolvency Proceeding&#148; means the commencement, after the date hereof, of any bankruptcy, insolvency, readjustment of debt, reorganization, marshalling of assets and liabilities or similar proceedings by or against the Trust, the Seller, the Servicer or Resources, the commencement, after the date hereof, of any proceedings by or against the Trust, the Seller, the Servicer or Resources for the winding up or liquidation of its affairs, or the consent, after the date hereof, to the appointment of a trustee, conservator, receiver or liquidator in any bankruptcy, insolvency, readjustment of debt, reorganization, marshalling of assets and liabilities or similar proceedings of or relating to the Trust, the Seller, the Servicer or Resources.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">As used herein the term &#147;Noteholder&#148; means each Noteholder who on the applicable Distribution Date is entitled under the terms of the related Note to receive payments thereunder. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Payment of amounts hereunder shall be made in immediately available funds on the later of (a)&nbsp;12:00 noon, New York City time, on the Business Day prior to the related Distribution Date and (b) 12:00 noon, New York City time, on the second Business Day following Receipt (as defined below) by MBIA of a notice for payment in the form of <U>Exhibit A</U> hereto (&#147;Notice for Payment&#148;), appropriately completed and executed by the Indenture Trustee. &nbsp;&nbsp;A Notice for Payment under this Policy may be Received (as defined below) by MBIA on any Business Day following the Determination Date in respect of which the Notice for Payment is being presented, but in any event, not later than the fourth Business Day prior to the applicable Distribution Date, by (a) Receipt by MBIA of the original Notice for Payment at the addresses set forth below, or (b) Receip
t by MBIA via facsimile transmission of the original Notice for Payment at the facsimile numbers set forth below. &nbsp;If presentation is made by facsimile transmission, the Indenture Trustee shall (i) simultaneously confirm transmission by telephone to MBIA and the Fiscal Agent at the telephone numbers set forth below, and (ii) as soon as reasonably practicable, deliver the original Notice for Payment to the MBIA and the Fiscal Agent at the addresses set forth below.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:6pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Subject to the foregoing, if the payment of any amount guaranteed by this Policy and previously distributed to a Noteholder in respect of the Notes that is recoverable and sought to be recovered as a voidable preference in an Insolvency Proceeding in accordance with a nonappealable order of a court having competent jurisdiction is voided (&#147;Avoided Payment&#148;), MBIA will make such Avoided Payment on behalf of the Noteholder upon Receipt by MBIA from the Indenture Trustee on behalf of such Noteholder of (i) a certified copy of a final, nonappealable order of a court &nbsp;having competent jurisdiction to the effect that the Noteholder &nbsp;is required to return any such payment or portion thereof prior to the Termination Date of this Policy because such payment was voided under applicable law (the &#147;Order&#148;) together with a certificate of such Noteholder
 that such Order is final and not subject to appeal, (ii) an assignment, substantially in the form attached hereto as <U>Exhibit B</U>, properly completed and executed by such Noteholder irrevocably assigning to MBIA all rights and claims of such Noteholder relating to or arising under such Avoided Payment, (iii) a Notice for Payment in the form of Exhibit A hereto appropriately completed and executed by the Indenture Trustee and (iv) appropriate instruments to effect the appointment of MBIA as agent for such Noteholder in any legal proceeding relating to such Avoided Payment.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">MBIA shall make payments due in respect of Avoided Payments no later than 12:00 noon, New York City time on the Business Day which is no earlier than (a) the fourth Business Day following Receipt by MBIA of the documents required under clauses (i) through (iv) of the preceding paragraph and (b) the date that such documents are Received by MBIA, if at least two Business Days prior to such Receipt, MBIA shall have Received written notice from the Indenture Trustee that such documents were to be delivered on such date and such date was specified in such notice. &nbsp;All payments made by MBIA hereunder on account of any Avoided Payment shall be made to the receiver or the trustee in bankruptcy named in the Order on behalf of the Noteholder and not to the Indenture Trustee or any Noteholder directly unless such Noteholder has returned such Avoided Payment to such recei
ver or trustee in bankruptcy, in which case such payment will be disbursed to the Indenture Trustee on behalf of such Noteholder upon proof of such payment reasonably satisfactory to MBIA.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">The terms &#147;Receipt&#148; and &#147;Received&#148; shall mean actual delivery to MBIA and State Street Bank and Trust Company, N.A., as fiscal agent for MBIA, or any successor fiscal agent appointed by MBIA (the &#147;Fiscal Agent&#148;), prior to 12:00 noon, New York City time, on a Business Day; delivery either on a day that is not a Business Day or after 12:00 noon, New York City time, shall be deemed to be Received on the next succeeding Business Day. &nbsp;If any Notice for Payment Received by MBIA is not in proper form or is otherwise insufficient for the purpose of making a claim hereunder, it shall be deemed not to have been Received by MBIA, and MBIA or the Fiscal Agent, as the case may be, shall promptly so advise the Indenture Trustee, and the Indenture Trustee may submit an amended Notice for Payment.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Payments due hereunder unless otherwise stated herein will be disbursed by the Fiscal Agent to the Indenture Trustee on behalf of the Noteholders by wire transfer of immediately available funds in the amount of such payment, less, in respect of Avoided Payments, any amounts held by the Indenture Trustee for the payment of such Avoided Payment and legally available therefor.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">The Fiscal Agent is the agent of MBIA only, and the Fiscal Agent shall in no event be liable to Noteholders for any acts of the Fiscal Agent or any failure of MBIA to deposit or cause to be deposited sufficient funds to make payments due under this Policy.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">MBIA shall be subrogated to the rights of each Noteholder to receive payments under the Notes to the extent of any payment by MBIA hereunder.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">MBIA hereby waives and agrees not to assert any and all rights to require the Indenture Trustee to make demand on or to proceed against any person, party or security prior to the Indenture Trustee demanding payment under this Policy.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">No defenses, set-offs and counterclaims of any kind available to MBIA so as to deny payment of any amount due in respect of this Policy will be valid and MBIA hereby waives and agrees not to assert any and all such defenses, set-offs and counterclaims, including, without limitation, any such rights acquired by subrogation, assignment or otherwise. &nbsp;Any rights of subrogation acquired by MBIA as a result of any payment made under this Policy shall, in all respects, be subordinate and junior in right of payment to the prior indefeasible payment in full of all amounts due the Indenture Trustee on account of payments due under the Notes. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">This Policy is neither transferable nor assignable, in whole or in part, except to a successor to the Indenture Trustee pursuant to the Indenture. &nbsp;All notices, presentations, transmissions, deliveries and communications made by the Indenture Trustee to MBIA with respect to this Policy shall specifically refer to the number of this Policy and shall be made to MBIA at:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">MBIA &nbsp;Insurance Corporation</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">113 King Street</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Armonk, New York &nbsp;10504</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Attention: Insured Portfolio Management, Structured Finance</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Telephone:</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">(914) 273-4545</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:-12pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Facsimile: </P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:72pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">(914) 765-3131</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding-left:108pt; padding-top:0pt; padding-right:0pt; padding-bottom:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">or such other address, telephone number or facsimile number as MBIA may designate to the Indenture Trustee in writing from time to time. &nbsp;Each such notice, presentation, transmission, delivery and communication shall be effective only upon actual receipt by MBIA.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">Any notice hereunder delivered to the Fiscal Agent of MBIA shall be made at the address listed below for the Fiscal Agent of MBIA or such other address as MBIA shall specify in writing to the Indenture Trustee.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:0pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><BR></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">The notice address of the Fiscal Agent is 61 Broadway, 15th Floor, New York, New York 10006 Attention: &nbsp;Municipal Registrar and Paying Agency, Facsimile: &nbsp;(212) 612-3201, Telephone: &nbsp;(212) 612-3458 or such other address as the Fiscal Agent shall specify to the Indenture Trustee in writing.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">The obligations of MBIA under this Policy are irrevocable, primary, absolute and unconditional (except as expressly provided herein) and neither the failure of the Issuer, the Indenture Trustee, the Indenture Collateral Agent, the Seller, the Servicer or any other person to perform any covenant or obligation in favor of MBIA (or otherwise), nor the failure or omission to make a demand permitted hereunder, nor the commencement of any bankruptcy, debtor or other insolvency proceeding by or against the Issuer, the Indenture Trustee, the Indenture Collateral Agent, the Seller, the Servicer or any other person shall in any way affect or limit MBIA's obligations under this Policy. &nbsp;If a successful action or proceeding to enforce this Policy is brought by the Indenture Trustee, the Indenture Trustee shall be entitled to recover from MBIA costs and expenses reasonably
 incurred, including without limitation reasonable fees and expenses of counsel.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">This Policy and the obligations of MBIA hereunder shall terminate on the date (the &#147;Termination Date&#148;) that is ninety-one days following the earlier of (i) the latest Final Scheduled Distribution Date and (ii) the date on which all amounts required to be paid to the Noteholders have been paid in full, <U>provided</U>, <U>that</U>, if any Insolvency Proceeding is existing by or against the Trust, the Seller, the Servicer or Resources during such ninety-one day period, then this Policy and MBIA's obligations hereunder shall terminate on the date of the conclusion or dismissal of such Insolvency Proceeding without continuing jurisdiction by the court in such Insolvency Proceeding, <U>provided</U>, <U>further</U> <U>that</U>, and notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, this Policy shall not terminate prior to the date on which MBIA has made all payme
nts required to be made under the terms of this Policy in respect of Avoided Payments.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">All payments made hereunder by MBIA shall be made with MBIA's own funds. &nbsp;The payment by MBIA to the Indenture Trustee of any amount guaranteed by the first paragraph of this Policy, and the payment by MBIA of any Avoided Payment shall constitute &#147;<U>payments</U>&#148; for all purposes under this Policy. &nbsp;In no event shall any payment be made under this Policy on account of (a) the failure of the Indenture Trustee to deliver the proceeds of any such payment to any Noteholder or (b) the failure of any such Noteholder to claim any such proceeds from the Indenture Trustee.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000"><B>This Policy is not covered by the property/casualty insurance fund specified in Article Seventy-Six of the New York State insurance law.</B></P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">This Policy sets forth in full the undertaking of MBIA, and shall not, except with the prior written consent of the Indenture Trustee or otherwise in accordance with the express terms hereof, be modified, altered or affected by any other agreement or instrument, including any modification or amendment thereto and may not be canceled or revoked by MBIA prior to the Termination Date. &nbsp;The Premium (as defined in the Insurance Agreement) on this Policy is not refundable for any reason.</P>
<P style="margin-left:0pt; margin-top:7.2pt; margin-bottom:7.2pt; padding:0pt; text-indent:36pt; line-height:12pt; font-size:12pt; color:#000000">This Policy shall be returned to MBIA by the Indenture Trustee on the Termination Date.</P>
